exam_name: CUEE - Centurion University Entrance Examination

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CUEE 2024- Centurion University has commenced the CUEE 2024 admission process. Interested candidates can find the CUEE 2024 application form at cuee.cutm.ac.in. The university is conducting the entrance exam in 6 phases for each month till August. Students who have qualified 10+2 board exam with 50% aggregate marks in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics are eligible to apply for CUEE exam 2024. The last to apply for CUEE 2024 for each phase is 25th of the same month of the exam. Centurion University Entrance Exam date 2024 are- Jan 30, Feb 29, Mar 30, Apr 30 and May 30. Applicants who fill the CUEE 2024 application before the last date will get their login ID and password on their registered email address before the exam. 

  • CUEE Entrance Exam 2024 is being held online in a remote proctored mode.
  • The CUEE 2024 application form fee is INR 600/-.
  • Applicants who qualify CUEE 2024 entrance exam will get intimation of their selection through an admission letter sent to their registered email address. 

About CUEE exam
Centurion University conducts the Centurion University Entrance Exam, also called CUEE for admissions to its B.Tech and B.Sc courses. Admission to the university are also provided based on other qualifying exams such as JEE Main /EAMCET and more. Candidates will be allotted seats through CUEE 2024 based on their ranks, preferences and availability of seats.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The exam conducting authority has released the CUEE 2024 eligibility criteria in the official notification. Applicants appearing for the exam must check the CUEE eligibility criteria before filling the application form. The eligibility criteria of CUEE 2024 comprises age limit, educational qualification, marks required and others. For more details about CUEE entrance exam 2024 eligibility, candidates can check the table below.

CUEE Eligibility 2024

Particulars

Details

Age Limit

There is no age limit for CUEE 2024

Academic Qualification

The candidates should have passed or should be appearing in the 10+2 qualifying (or equivalent) examination with Science and Mathematics.

Marks Required

Should have secured at least 50% aggregate marks (45% for reserved category) in 10+2 qualifying (or equivalent) examination.

Qualifying Examination

For admissions, the candidates should have qualified CUEE 2024 (Centurion University Entrance Examination)

application_process.html_content:
Centurion University has commenced the CUEE 2024 registration at cuee.cutm.ac.in. Candidates who meet the CUEE eligibility criteria can submit the CUEE application form 2024. Below are the steps to apply for CUEE exam 2024.

Steps for Online CUEE 2024 Registration

  • CUEE registration 2024: The first step is to complete the CUEE application form 2024 from the official website. Applicants have to provide a valid email ID and mobile number in the registration form. The next step is to validate the email ID and mobile number with a one time password.
  • Filling CUEE entrance exam application form: After successful registration, candidates have to fill details in the CUEE 2024 application form. Candidates have to fill educational, personal and communication details in the application form. 
  • Payment of application fee: The next step is to pay the application fee of CUEE in online mode through net banking/credit card/debit card. CUEE application fee is Rs 600. 
  • Preview and submit application form: The last step is to preview all details and submit the application form.

Contact Details
“The Director (Admissions),
Centurion University, Jatni,
Bhubaneshwar, Pin-752050,
Odisha”
Application Fee – Rs 600

admit_card.html_content:

Candidates who complete the CUEE registration 2024 will be able to download the CUEE admit card using their login credentials. CUEE 2024 exam will be conducted in online home proctored mode. The exam authority will send the login credentials for the exam at registered email ID in due time. The steps to download the CUEE admit card 2024 are mentioned below.

How to Download CUEE 2024 Admit Card?

  • Visit the official website at cuee.cutm.ac.in.
  • Click on the link to download CUEE admit card 2024.
  • Applicants have to provide their email ID and password.
  • Click on Submit
  • The admit card of CUEE 2024 will be displayed on the screen which the candidates will have to download and print out.

counselling_process.html_content: Candidates will be called for the counselling of CUEE 2024 according to the qualifying exam (CUEE 2024 (Centurion University Entrance Examination)). Verification of the documents will be done and the candidates will be allotted seats as per their rank, preferences and availability of seat. Payment of the remaining fee has to be done for confirmation of admission.

exam_name: DUAT - Digital University Admission Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
DUAT 2025- Digital university of Kerala will release a detailed notification for admission to BTech courses at duk.ac.in. Admission to engineering courses in DUK will be done through the Digital University Admission Test (DUAT-2025). Candidates who have qualified the CUET (PG) 2025 and GATE 2025 exams will get admission as well. Candidates must ensure they fill up the application form of their

The Digital University of Kerala was previously called IIITM-Kerala. The university was upgraded to a digital university status to give more emphasis on disruptive technologies. These include blockchain, the Internet of Things, AI and Data analytics. Hence, the university set up five different Schools under the new digital university.

Digital University Admission Test (DUAT-2025) is an admission test conducted by the Digital University of Kerala for admission into Mtech courses offered by the university. The university offers MTech in 3 subjects: M.Tech Computer Science and Engineering, M.Tech Electronics Engineering and M.Tech Electronic Product Design. Apart from DUAT 2025, candidates can also apply through GATE 2025 and CUET PG 2025. 

DUAT 2025 Exam Highlights

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Digital University of Kerala will release the DUAT 2025 eligibility criteria on the official website. Candidates interested in pursuing MTech in the university must thoroughly go through the DUAT 2025 eligibility criteria before applying for admission. The complete criteria can be found in the official information brochure. Both the general criteria & the course-wise criteria are specific below.

DUAT 2025 Eligibility

  • Candidates require a minimum of 60% or CGPI of 6.5.

  • Candidates who are either appearing for or have already appeared for the BTech final semester exams can also apply for admissions, provided they fulfil the following two conditions

1) Appearing for all the final exams for the first time (no repetition).

2) Completed all prior exams without backlogs.

DUAT 2025 Course-wise eligibility

Programme/ Course offered 

Eligibility 

Computer Science and Engineering

B.Tech or BE in CS/IT/ECE or related areas OR MCA OR M.Sc in CS/IT/Mathematics/Statistics/ Physics with aggregate 60% marks or above. Relaxation in marks to reserved candidates as per university norms.  

Electronics Engineering 

B.Tech or BE in EE/ECE/AEI/EI/Robotics/IoT or similar electronics hardware branches OR MSc. Electronics/Instrumentation or equivalent with aggregate 60% marks or above. CS/CSE/IT or similar branches are not eligible. 


Electronic Product Design

Any B.Tech. or MSc degree or equivalent with aggregate 60% marks or above.


DUAT 2025 admission channels:

Digital university of kerala will conduct the registration process for admission to MTech courses. The university will announce the MTech 2025 admission schedule on the official website. Interested candidates can apply fir the digital university admission through 3 channels.  Candidates must ensure they complete the registration for their preferred channel in the specified dates mentioned on the website. The 3 channels for admission to Digital university of kerala are specified below.

  • DUAT 2025: The Digital University of Kerala will conduct the Digital University Admission Test (DUAT-2025) in online mode. The authority will release the notification for the DUAT 2025 admission on the official website. 
  • CUET 2025: Candidates who have qualified in the Common University Entrance Test - CUET(PG) 2025 are also eligible for admission into Digital university of kerala. Digital University of Kerala will release the notification regarding application dates for CUET 2025- qualified candidates. The notification regarding registration & exam dates of CUET 2025 will be released by National Testing Agency(NTA) at www.nta.ac.in. 
  • GATE 2025: IIT Roorkee will hold GATE 2025. Candidates should score well to apply for admission to engineering PG courses. The official notification with information about the application dates for MTech courses at Digital University of kerala will be released on the official website.

application_process.html_content:
Candidates who wish to apply through the DUAT 2025 channel must attempt the exam for admission into the Mtech courses offered by the university. The DUAT 2025 admission process will include the following steps

Step 1: Registration

Candidates need to register on the official admission portal to apply for the DUAT 2025 exam. The following steps can be followed to register for DUAT 2025.

  • Click on the DUAT 2025 registration link & choose “sign up”

  • Submit name, email id, mobile number & course you are applying for in the signup page.

  • An email with the login credentials will be sent to the registered email id.

  • Login & complete the  DUAT registration process

Step  2: DUAT 2025 application details

Candidates will be required to apply for the DUAT 2025 using the required credentials as specified in the application form.

Step 3:  DUAT 2025 upload of documents

The following documents should be kept handy by the candidates before commencing the application process. The scanned copies of these documents need to be uploaded

  • Qualifying exam marksheets

  •  Degree/ provisional degree certificates, 

  • Migration certificate

  • Signature, Photo and any  government- issue ID Card 

Step 4: Fee Payment

Candidates should make sure to pay the application fee while applying for DUAT 2025. Failure to pay the fee will result in the application being incomplete.

Upon successful fee payment, the application form will automatically be submitted. Once the application is submitted, the candidate will receive a copy of their duly- filled in DUAT application form 2025.

Channel

fees

Through DUAT/GATE 2025

General -Rs 750

Reserved - Rs 375

Through CUET(PG) 2025

General- Rs 100

Reserved- Rs 50

NOTE:  Candidates wanting to apply for more than one programme group can do so by creating separate accounts, either using a different email id or the same one, for each programme they are applying for.

admit_card.html_content: The admit card for DUAT 2025 will be released by the authority once the registration process is concluded. The DUAT 2025 admit card will contain details such as name, exam time and exam date will be specified. Candidates will be able to download their DUAT 2025 admit card by entering their login credentials such as registration number & password.

counselling_process.html_content: Digital University of Kerala will conduct the DUK counselling in online mode. Candidates who have qualified in the DUAT 2025, CUET PG 2025 & GATE 2025 are eligible to apply for the DUK 2025 counselling process. The dates for registration through each of the channels will be specified separately on the official website.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Candidates must thoroughly go through the DUAT 2025 exam pattern before attempting the exam. The detailed exam pattern is as follows:

  • Mode of examination: Online

  • Duration of the exam: 1 hour

  • Total questions: 60

  • Marking scheme:

    • +4 will be awarded for the right answer       

    •     -1 will be deducted for the wrong answer

faqs.question: What are the exam centres for DUAT 2025?
faqs.answer: DUAT 2025 is a remote exam, hence registered candidates can attempt the exam from their home.

faqs.question: Can I get admission for DUK only through DUAT 2025?
faqs.answer: No, GATE 2025 & CUET PG 2025 qualified candidates can also register for admission to DUK.

faqs.question: When will DUK commence the counselling process for CUET PG 2025?
faqs.answer: The authority will release the counselling 2025 schedule for CUET (PG) 2025 on the official website.

faqs.question: Is IITM- Kerala the same as the Digital university of kerala?
faqs.answer: Yes, previously called as IIITM-Kerala, the university was upgraded to a digital university status. Hence the new name of the university is Digital University of Kerala.

faqs.question: When will the DUAT 2025 exam be conducted?
faqs.answer: Digital University of Kerala will announce DUAT 2025 schedule soon on the official website

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
DPU AIBTCET 2024 - Dr DY Patil University has announced the DPU AIBTCET 2024 result online. The authority has updated the DPU AIBCET reusult 2024 link on the official website, admissions.dpuerp.in/LandingPages. DPU AIBTCET 2024 was held on April 21, 2024 (11:00 AM to 12.30 PM). The authority concluded the DPU AIBTCET 2024 application process. Candidates willing to fill out the application form are advised to check the eligibility criteria of DPU AIBTCET 2024 exam before applying. 

Failure to fulfill the eligibility criteria of a candidate will lead to cancellation of their B.Tech/M.Tech admission. The authority has released the DPU AIBTCET 2024 official brochure on the website. Read all the details about DPU AIBTCET exam like eligibility criteria, how to apply, syllabus, exam pattern, admission process, and more here. 

Candidates with minimum 45% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Biology taken together (40% for the Reserve Category candidates) at Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC / Std. XII) examination OR equivalent qualification of any board in India or abroad, with Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Life Sciences (and desirably with Mathematics) are eligible to apply.

Candidates willing to take admission into B.Tech, M.Tech(Integrated) courses at DY Patil University through DPU AIBTCET 2024 exam can check all the details regarding, admission process, admit card, answer key, result, and counselling procedure here.

What is DPU AIBTCET Exam:

DY Patil University All India Biotechnology Common Entrance Test (DPU AIBTCET- 2024) is All India level entrance test conducted  every year for admission to Biotechnology courses at the university. Candidates will be given admission to DY Patil University based on their DPU AIBTCET rank via an online process.

highlights.value: DY Patil University All India Biotechnology Common Entrance Test

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
DY Patil University has released the DPU AIBTCET 2024 eligibility criteria on the official website admissions.dpu.edu.in. The eligibility criteria of DPU AIBTCET 2024 includes the requirements that candidates have to meet to be eligible to appear for DPU AIBTCET 2024. Here we have mentioned the eligibility criteria for candidate’s reference. 

Eligibility criteria for Indian Nationals:

  1. The candidate should be an Indian National.  

  2. Minimum age: 17 years on or before 31 December 2022.

  3. The candidate must have either appeared at Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC / Std. XII) examination OR equivalent qualification of any board in India or abroad, with Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Life Sciences (and desirably with Mathematics) or, if the result of the exam. has been declared, he / she must have passed the same examination with minimum 45% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Biology taken together (40% for the Reserve Category candidates). 

Eligibility forNRI / PIO / FN:

A candidate in any of these categories shall have completed 17 years of age on or before 31 December 2022. He/she must have Physics, Chemistry, Biology or Life Sciences and English (and desirably Mathematics) at the CBSE, ISC, HSC or an equivalent examination. In the case of a student from any school that follows the American system of education, the candidate must have studied Physics, Chemistry and Biology (and desirably Mathematics) at AP' (Advanced Placement) level and must have minimum 'C' grade in these subjects. 

In the case of students passing Cambridge International Examination (CIE) the candidate should have passed Physics, Chemistry and Biology at “Advanced” level along with English at “Advanced Subsidiary” (AS) level.

application_process.html_content:
The application form for DPU AIBTECT 2024 was available on the official website. Candidates were required to submit the application form in online mode before the last date. To apply for DPU AIBTECT 2024 candidates must check the eligibility criteria before applying for the exam. 

How To Fill Online DPU AIBTCET 2024 Form:

  • The application form for DPU AIBTCET 2024 is available in online mode only at dpu.edu.in.

  • Click on “Apply Online” button

  • Select the course, country, fill your name, mobile number, email id, city, state, enter your password.

  • Now click on the “Verify Details”.

  • Upload your required documents.

  • Now pay the fees according to the category you fall in.

  • Click on Submit button

  • Take a printout of both the documents for your reference. 

  • Link to print Admit Cards will be provided later and you will be intimated on your email ID and also through SMS on your given mobile number. 

  • At last, take the printout of the duly filled application form for future reference.

Note: Candidates should verify their details mentioned in the DPU AIBTCET 2024 application form before final submission as no correction facility for the application form will be available to candidates. 

Documents Required to be uploaded in DPU AIBTCET 2024 application form:

  1. SSC/10th exam marksheet

  2. HSC / 12th exam Marksheet. 

  3. Any other education marksheet/certificate

  4. School leaving certificate

  5. Gap certificate (if applicable)

  6. Transfer certificate (if applicable)

  7. Migration certificate (if applicable)

  8. Aadhar Card

  9. PAN card

  10. 2 Passport size photographs

  11. Qualifying Degree / Provisional Certificate.

preparation_tips.html_content:
Students preparing for DPU AIBTCET 2024 exam are advised to go through the preparation tips of the exam so as to perform well and get good marks. Here are a few tips from Careers360 that you need to follow to prepare well for the exam:

  • Firstly, go through the official syllabus of DPU AIBTCET 2024

  • Understand the DPU AIBTCET 2024 paper pattern and demand of the exam

  • Get best preparation books for DPU 2024

  • Plan a proper schedule

  • Start with the basic books and then move on to the standard books of DPU 

  • Solve the previous year’s papers and mock tests

  • Do not forget to revise at all

admit_card.html_content:
DPU AIBTCET admit card 2024 will be released by DY Patil University on their official website. Only those candidates who will register successfully for DPU will be able to download DPU AIBTCET admit card 2024 in online mode within the given timelines. To download the DPU AIBTCET 2024, candidates need to enter their login details. The admit card of DPU AIBTCET 2024 will include details like the candidate's name, exam date, exam time, and test centre address. 

How To Download Admit Card:

  • Open the official website of DPU AIBTCET 2024

  • Click on “Admit Card” link.

  • Enter your Email ID and password.

  • Enter the captcha code.

  • Click on “Download Admit Card” button.

  • Take the printout of the DPU AIBTCET 2024 admit card.

Note: Take 2 printouts of the admit card and save it for future reference.

DPU AIBTCET 2024 Exam Day Guidelines:

  • Candidates must bring their DPU AIBTCET 2024 admit card along with a valid government authorised ID proof as per the guidelines for exam day in order to enter the examination hall.

  • Candidates must reach their centres at least 60 minutes prior to reporting time, as mentioned in the DPU AIBTCET 2024 exam admit card.

  • Candidates are advised to carry two passport-sized photos(same as uploaded in application form) if the photo on their admit card is not clear. 

  • Candidates will not be allowed to carry any electronic devices like Bluetooth, calculators, smartwatches, cellphones in the DPU AIBTCET exam hall.

faqs.question: Is DPU AIBTCET 2024 exam online or offline?
faqs.answer: DPU AIBTCET was held in Proctored Online Mode. Examinees had to log in through the link provided to take the test within the time mentioned on the admit card.

faqs.question: What is the DPU AIBTCET exam pattern?
faqs.answer: The AIBTCET 2024 exam had 100 questions of the MCQ type. The papers consisted of four sections with equal weightage. Questions were asked from Physics, Chemistry and Biology (Botany and Zoology).

faqs.question: What are the details mentioned on DPU AIBTCET admit card?
faqs.answer: The DPU AIBTCET admit card mentions the candidate's name, seat number, father's Name, photograph and signature.

faqs.question: What is the age limit for DPU AIBTCET 2024?
faqs.answer: Applicants must have completed 17 years on or before 31st December 2023, to be eligible for admission through DPU AIBTCET 2024.

faqs.question: What is DPU AIBTCET conducted for?
faqs.answer: DY Patil University conducts AIBTCET exam for admission to- B.Tech (Biotechnology), M.Tech. (Integrated Biotechnology), B. Tech. (Medical Biotechnology) and M.Sc. (Biotechnology).

exam_name: JEEDEC - Joint Entrance Examination for Degree Evening Courses

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
JEEDEC 2023 - The Joint Entrance Examination for Degree Evening Courses (JEEDEC) 2023 is a state-level entrance exam conducted by Jadavpur University, Kolkata, India. The JEEDEC exam 2023 will be held once a year, and it is conducted to offer admission to eligible candidates in the five-year evening B.E/B.Tech degree courses offered by the university. The JEEDEC 2023 exam is expected to be held in June 2023, and the application process is likely to begin in April 2023. Before applying for JEEDEC 2023 candidates have to check the eligibility criteria. The exact dates and other details related to the exam will be announced on the official website of Jadavpur University. 

JEEDEC 2023 Latest News and Notification

  • JEEDEC 2023 will be conducted by Jadavpur University. However, candidates are advised to keep a regular check on the official website at jaduniv.edu.in for the latest updates and notifications related to JEEDEC 2023.

  • Once the official notification for JEEDEC 2023 is released, it will contain all the important information related to the exam, such as the exam date, application process, eligibility criteria, exam pattern, syllabus, and counselling process.

  • Candidates should also keep a check on leading education websites and newspapers for updates related to JEEDEC 2023. It is important to stay updated with the latest news and notifications to avoid missing any important information related to the exam.

About JEEDEC Exam

JEEDEC stands for Joint Entrance Examination for Degree Evening Courses. It is a state-level entrance exam conducted by Jadavpur University, Kolkata, India. The exam is conducted once a year and is held to offer admission to eligible candidates in five-year evening B.E/B.Tech degree courses offered by Jadavpur University.

To be eligible for JEEDEC, candidates must have passed a diploma in Engineering/Technology/Pharmacy with at least 60% marks or a B.Sc degree with Mathematics as a subject with at least 60% marks. The upper age limit for the candidates is 27 years as of 1st July of the year of admission.

highlights.value: Joint Entrance Examination for Degree Evening Courses

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
• JEEDEC 2023 eligibility criteria, candidates must have passed the Diploma examination in the same branch to which they are applying for admission from a UGC recognized Indian University or Government/Statutory Body with at least 60% marks or equivalent grade point in aggregate for the general category and 45% for SC, ST, OBC-A, OBC-B, PwD candidates.

  • In case the final result is published in the grade point system only, the candidates must convert the same into equivalent percentage marks using either the conversion formula of the concerned board/university (if available) or the AICTE advised formula. The formula for conversion of grade point to percentage marks is as follows:

  • Percentage marks = (Grade Point – 0.75) x 10 (when Grade Point is in a scale of 10)

  • If the grade point is not in a scale of 10, the obtained grade point must be converted to a grade point in a scale of 10 on a pro rata basis.

  • Final year students may also apply for JEEDEC 2023, but their admission or studentship will be cancelled unless they submit their final result by 30th October 2023. It is important for candidates to carefully read and understand the eligibility criteria before applying for the exam.

application_process.html_content:
The JEEDEC 2023 application form will be released by the West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board (WBJEEB) on its official website wbjeeb.nic.in. Interested candidates can fill and submit the JEEDEC 2023 application form through online mode before the deadline. The following steps are involved in the application process.

How to fill JEEDEC Application Form 2023?

Step 1: Registration

Visit the official website and click on the 'New Registration' link. Fill in the required details like name, date of birth, email ID, mobile number, and password.

Step 2: Filling of Application Form

Fill in the application form with your personal and academic details, communication details, and other necessary information.

Step 3: Upload Scanned Images

Upload scanned images of your photograph and signature as per the prescribed format and size. Scanned copies of the following documents (150 dpi colour in pdf format) are to be uploaded along with the application. The maximum size of the uploaded file should not exceed 100 KB. In case any such is of multiple pages the same should be scanned as a single pdf

Step 4: Payment of Application Fee

Pay the application fee through the available payment options like sbi i collect portal.

Step 5: Submission of Application Form

Verify all the details and submit the application form. Take a printout of the application form and payment receipt for future reference.

JEEDEC Application Fees

All applicants for admission to UG (Evening) Engineering programs at Jadavpur University are required to pay an application fee of Rs. 400/- (four hundred only) at the time of application. The payment must be made online through the SBI iCollect portal and must be completed by will be released on the official website. Please note that if the application fee is not paid, the application will be rejected. It is mandatory for all applicants to pay the fee in order to complete the application process.

preparation_tips.html_content:
Here are some useful preparation tips that candidates can follow to prepare for JEEDEC 2023:

Understand the Syllabus: Candidates should carefully study the syllabus and understand the important topics that need to be covered. This will help them to focus their preparation and avoid wasting time on unnecessary topics.

Plan a Study Schedule: Candidates should make a study schedule that includes a balanced distribution of time for each subject and topic. This will help them to cover the entire syllabus in a systematic manner.

Practise Previous Year Question Papers: Candidates should practise previous year question papers and analyse the pattern of questions asked in the exam. This will help them to understand the type of questions asked and the level of difficulty.

Take Mock Tests: Candidates should take mock tests to evaluate their preparation and identify their strengths and weaknesses. This will also help them to improve their time-management skills and build their confidence.

Revise Regularly: Candidates should revise the topics regularly to retain the information and improve their memory. This will help them to recall the important concepts during the exam.

Stay Calm and Confident: Candidates should stay calm and confident during the exam and avoid getting nervous. They should also manage their time effectively and attempt the questions that they are sure about first.

admit_card.html_content:
The university will release the JEEDEC admit card 2023 on its official website. The JEEDEC 2023 Admit Card is an essential document that every candidate must carry to the examination hall. The admit card will contain important information such as the candidate's name, roll number, photograph, signature, exam date, time, and venue. It is advisable to check all the details on the admit card carefully before downloading and taking a printout. Candidates must carry a valid government-issued photo ID proof along with the admit card to the exam hall. It is important to note that without a valid JEEDEC 2023 Admit Card, candidates will not be allowed to appear for the exam. Therefore, candidates must keep the admit card safe and secure until the completion of the exam process.

How to download the JEEDEC admit card 

  • Visit the official website of the conducting authority or relevant exam board.

  • Click on the 'JEEDEC Admit Card 2023' link.

  • Enter your login credentials such as application number, password, and security pin.

  • Click on the 'Submit' button.

  • Your JEEDEC admit card will be displayed on the screen.

  • Check all the details on the admit card carefully, including your name, photograph, signature, exam date, time, and venue.

  • Download the admit card and take a printout.

  • Keep the admit card safely and carry it to the examination hall on the day of the exam.

cutoffs.html_content:
The JEEDEC 2023 cutoff will be the minimum score required by candidates to qualify for admission to the degree evening courses offered by Jadavpur University. The cutoff will be determined based on various factors such as the number of candidates who appeared for the exam, the difficulty level of the exam, and the availability of seats in the courses. The JEEDEC 2023 cutoff will be announced by Jadavpur University along with the result. Candidates who score above the cutoff will be eligible for the counselling process, while candidates who score below the cutoff will not be eligible for admission. 

It is important for candidates to note that the cutoff may vary for different courses and categories. Candidates are advised to check the cutoff for their respective category and course before applying for admission. Candidates who qualify the JEEDEC 2023 exam and meet the cutoff criteria will be called for the counselling process. During the counselling process, candidates will be allotted seats based on their rank in the merit list, availability of seats, and their preferred choice of course and college.

counselling_process.html_content:
The JEEDEC 2023 counselling process will be conducted by Jadavpur University for candidates who have qualified the entrance exam and meet the cutoff criteria. The counselling process is an important step for candidates who wish to secure admission to the degree evening courses offered by the university.

Here are the important details about the JEEDEC 2023 counselling process:

  • Counselling Registration: Candidates who have qualified the JEEDEC 2023 exam and meet the cutoff criteria will be required to register for the counselling process on the official website of Jadavpur University.

  • Choice Filling: After the registration process, candidates will be required to fill in their choices of courses and colleges based on their preferences.

  • Seat Allotment: Seats will be allotted to candidates based on their rank in the merit list, availability of seats, and their preferred choice of course and college. Candidates who are allotted a seat will be required to pay the admission fees and complete the admission formalities within the specified time period.

  • Document Verification: Candidates who are allotted a seat will be required to attend the document verification process in person and carry all the necessary documents for verification.

  • Reporting to the College: After the document verification process, candidates will be required to report to the allotted college within the specified time period and complete the admission formalities.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The JEEDEC exam pattern consists of 50 multiple-choice questions (MCQs), and the duration of the exam is 90 minutes. The questions are divided into two sections, and the syllabus for Section B varies depending on the qualifying examination of the candidate.

syllabus.main_exam_title: JEEDEC 2023 Joint Entrance Examination for Degree Evening Courses 2023

units.topics_html: • Basic concepts, series and parallel AC circuits, series and parallel resonance, AC and DC circuits analysis, network theorems, transient in DC circuit, Laplace transform, two port network

• Mechanism of electro-mechanical energy conversion, DC generator and motor, single phase transformer, three phase transformer, auto transformer, Scott connection, open delta connection, three-phase induction motor, alternator, synchronous motor
  • Single phase motors, special motor

• Basics of power transmission, layout, transmission line components, transmission line parameters, underground cables, performance of transmission line, extra high voltage transmission, components of distribution system, substations

• Necessity and functions, circuit interrupting devices, circuit breakers, auto-reclosing, protective relaying, over current relay, directional relay, distance protection scheme, differential relay, static over current relays, generator protection
  • Transformer protection, protection of busbar and transmission line, over voltage protection

• Fundamentals and basic requirements, measurement of single phase and three phase current, voltage, power and energy, measurement of resistance, single phase and three phase power factor meter, digital multimeter, syncronoscope
  • Instrument transformer: CT and PT

• Transducers: Types, classification, transducer for measurement of temperature, pressure, velocity, speed, displacement; capacitive and piezoelectric transducer, load cell, tachometer, electromagnetic and turbine flow meter
  • Signal conditioning: Concept, AC and DC signal conditioning, instrumentation amplifier, filters, digital instruments and display devices; pilot devices: Push button, limit switch, float switch, electromagnetic relay, pressure switch
  • Thermostats plugging switch, proximity switch; control system: Classification, feedback control system, idea on stability, control system components, concept of transfer function, poles and zeros, transfer function of first and second order system
  • Time response characteristics of first and second order system to unit step excitation, block diagram representation of control system, stability concept, ON/OFF, P, PI, PD, PID controller

• Illumination: Terms used in illumination, laws of illumination, different types of lamps, electric heating, resistance heating, arc heating, induction heating, dielectric heating, electric welding, electric drives, electric traction
  • Illumination: Traction mechanics, traction motors, economic aspects of utilising electrical energy

• Basics of power generation, thermal power stations, nuclear power stations, hydro power stations, diesel electric power stations, gas turbine power plants, non-conventional energy sources, solar energy, wind energy, economics of power generation
  • Interconnected power systems

• Semiconductor diode, zener diode, rectifiers and filters, bipolar junction transistor (BJT), field effect transistor (JFET), unijunction transistor (UJT), biasing of BJT, regulated power supply, small signal amplifiers
• Thyristor (SCR), switching and timer circuits, AC to DC converter, inverter, DC chopper, DC and AC drives, uninterrupted power supply

• Power amplifiers, FET amplifier, operational amplifier, feedback amplifiers and oscillators, Boolean algebra and combinational logic circuits, sequential logic circuits, data converters and memory devices
• Microprocessor basics, microprocessor programming, application of microprocessor, microcontroller basics, 8051 addressing modes and instructions, 8051 interrupts, application

subjects.subject_name: Civil engineering-part-A (strength of materials and engineering mechanics)

units.syllabus_unit: Civil engineering-part-A (strength of materials and engineering mechanics)
units.topics_html:
• Friction between solid bodies; equilibrium of rigid bodies; centre of mass and centre of gravity; work, power and energy; principle of virtual work. direct and shear stresses, strain elasticity, Hooke's law, Poisson's ratio, Young's modulus
  • Modulus of rigidity and bulk modulus, working stress, factor of safety
  • Structural elements, BM and SF diagrams theory of simple bending
  • Distribution of bending stresses and shear stresses, principal stresses and principal planes, Mohr's circle, moment of internal section modulus, radius of gyrations, torsion of circular shafts
  • Use of simple column formula
  • Solution of determinate trusses
  • Fluid mechanics-pressure at a point, Pascal's law of pressure within a static fluid, buoyancy, stability of submerged and floating bodies; steady and unsteady row, uniform and nonuniform row, laminar and turbulent row
  • Reynolds number

• Surveying: Surveying correction for measured length by chain and tape. Field problems and their solutions, compass traversing. Closing error in compass traverse and its correction, levelling. Cross-section long section, measurement of areas
  • Surveying: Plane table surveying, contouring
  • Planning and construction: Brick bonding, types of ordinary foundations, shoring and timbering. D.P.C. flooring. Plastering, white washing. Skirting, dado, layout of water and sanitary lines in residential building. Water closets, intercepting chambers
  • Planning and construction: Connection of house drains to streets sewers
  • Irrigation: Methods of irrigation, water requirement of crops, groundwater-well hydraulics, design of irrigation canal systems
  • Sanitary engineering: Sewers, sewer appurtenances, different system of sewerage, sewage boo of sewage, aerobic and anaerobic process fundamentals of septic tanks, activated sludge and trickling niters. Demand of water, potable water, source of water
  • Sanitary engineering: Development of ground water sources, impurities in natural waters. Water works intake, slow sand filter, rapid sand filters. Disinfection of public water supplies, causes and removal of hardness
  • Soil mechanics: Formation, identification and classification of soils. Three phase system water content, void ratio, degree of saturation, bulk density etc. Limits of consistency. Total and effective stress
  • Roads and railways: Roads and railways survey. Construction and maintenance, road permanent way structures with formation, road and railway crossings road intersections and railway track connections of various types road signs, railway signals
  • Roads and railways: Railway yards, road metals and their specifications, parts of culverts

exam_name: SNUSAT - SNU Scholastic Aptitude Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
SNUSAT 2024 - SNU commenced the SNUSAT 2024 registration process for round 3 on June 1, 2024. The authority updated the link for SNUSAT registration 2024 at snu.edu.in. Candidates can register for SNUSAT 2024 round 3 till June 30. Shiv Nadar University aspirants must check the eligibility criteria before filling out the SNUSAT application form. Shiv Nadar University conducts its own entrance exam - SNUSAT and APT to offer B.Tech admissions. The Scholastic Aptitude Test is conducted for two hours while the APT is conducted for 45 minutes each for Physics and Maths. The authorities will release the round 3 offer letter as per the the following schedule.

SNUSAT/SAT/ACT/JEE taken between or by 
Offer letters will be released byLast Date to pay the fees
June 1 to 15, 2024
June 24, 2024
July 10, 2024
June 16 to 30 2024
July 10, 2024

The eligibility criteria of SNUSAT requires candidates to pass class 12 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English as mandatory subjects with an aggregate of atleast 65%. The authorities have specified the programme-wise eligibility on the official website. A candidate with high JEE Main scores will be eligible for direct admission in SNU. 

Candidates are advised to check the SNUSAT 2024 exam pattern and syllabus for complete understanding of the exam. The examination will consist of multiple choice questions (MCQ) out of four sections namely, Verbal reasoning, quantitative ability, abstract reasoning, and essay. The duration of the examination will be 120 minutes. 

The SNUSAT result will be announced in online mode. Qualified candidates will be able to participate in the counselling of SNUSAT 2024. The seat allotment will be done on the basis of merit, preference, and availability of seats. JEE Main candidates with a high percentile will be eligible for direct admission to the university.

SNUSAT 2024 Latest News and Updates

  • Round 3 SNUSAT exam started on June 1 and will conclude on June 30.
  • Round 2 SNUSAT exam started on April 1 and will conclude on May 31.
  • Round 1 SNUSAT (exam 2) started on January 1 and will conclude on January 30.
  • SNUSAT round 1  (exam 1) concluded on December 31, 2023
  • The authority commenced the SNUSAT 2024 registration for round 1 on December 12.  

What is SNUSAT?
SNUSAT is a university-level entrance exam conducted by SNU for admission to various UG-level courses at Shiv Nadar University. The admission to SNU is conducted on the basis of SAT, ACT, and JEE Main scores followed by an interview process and document verification. 

Contact Details:

E-mail ID: admissions@snu.edu.in 

Helpline:  (+91-120) – 7170100.

application_process.html_content:
SNU commenced the SNUSAT 2024 application form process in online mode at snu.edu.in. Candidates can fill the application form of SNUSAT 2024 in online mode. However, the authorities have started the application process through JEE Main and remote proctored SNUSAT & APT separately. Check the steps to fill SNUSAT 2024 application form mentioned below. 

  • Visit the official website for SNUSAT - snuadmission.com
  • Fill out the SNUSAT 2024 registration form with basic details like name, email address, registered mobile number, and state details. 
  • Candidates will receive their login credentials on the E-mail ID after verification. 
  • Fill the SNUSAT application form 2024 with personal details. 
  • Upload the photograph and signature in the prescribed format. 
  • Make a payment of the SNUSAT application fee to complete the registration process.
