exam_name: TS POLYCET - Telangana State Polytechnic Common Entrance Test
conducting_body: State Board of Technical Education and Training Telangana

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
TS POLYCET 2024: SBTET, Telangana has announced the TS Polycet phase 2 seat allotment on July 31, 2024. The registered candidates can check the seat allotment of TS Polycet 2024 on the website, tspolycet.nic.in. The authority has announced the TS Polycet 2024 seat allotment result for phase 1 on June 30.  The final TS POLYCET 2024 counselling registration commenced on July 26, 2024. Only TS POLYCET 2024 exam-qualified candidates can register for the TS POLYCET counselling 2024. Candidates must complete the counselling registration before the last date. 

The TS Polycet 2024 result was declared on June 3, 2024, at polycet.sbtet.telangana.gov.in. Along with the result, the authority has released the TS POLYCET 2024 rank card. Candidates need the hall ticket number, registration number, or mobile number to check the TS Polycet result 2024.

The authority has released the provisional TS Polycet 2024 answer key online. Candidates who appeared in the POLYCET-2024 examination can check the respective answer key (QP Code-A/B/C/D) of POLYCET-2024 and submit any objections or corrections via email to jtsecy-sbtet@telangana.gov.in. The deadline for submitting objections regarding the TS Polycet 2024 answer key was May 26, 2024. 

The TS POLYCET exam was conducted on May 24, 2024. TS Polycet 2024 admit card has been issued on May 14. Registered candidates can download the TS Polycet 2024 hall ticket from May 14 to 24. The authority concluded the TS POLYCET 2024 application form with a fine on May 14, 2024. The authority has revised the TS POLYCET 2024 exam date. TS POLYCET exam will be conducted in offline mode.

Candidates have to check the TS Polycet 2024 information booklet to know about the registration process, eligibility criteria, exam pattern, syllabus, and much more. Students who meet the minimum eligibility conditions can apply for the TS POLYCET 2024 exam. 

TS Polycet will be held for admission to the engineering or non-engineering courses offered in the Diploma institutes. Candidates need to fulfil the eligibility criteria and fill out the application form to appear for TS Polycet. Moreover, candidates can download the TS Polycet admit card after the completion of filling out the TS Polycet application form. 

TS Polycet 2024 latest news and notification

  • TS POLYCET 2024 seat allotment result for the special round has been announced on July 31, 2024.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 seat allotment result for phase 1 was announced on June 30, 2024.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 counselling registration commenced.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 result has been announced.

  • TS POLYCET provisional answer key has been released.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 exam concluded.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 admit card released on May 14.

  • Last date for POLYCET-2024 fee payment with fine has been extended to May 14, 2024

    Last date for POLYCET-2024 fee payment with fine has been extended to May 7, 2024

  • TS POLYCET registration date extended to April 28, 2024.

  • TS POLYCET 2024 exam date has been revised.

  • TS POLYCET registration commenced.

  • SBTET has announced the TS POLYCET 2024 exam date,i.e., May 17, 2024.

TS Polycet results will be announced online. Candidates who qualify for the entrance test will be eligible to participate in the counselling process. Candidates who are allotted seats have to appear for the document verification.

highlights.value: Telangana State Polytechnic Common Entrance Test
State Board of Technical Education and Training Telangana

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authority has released the TS Polycet 2024 eligibility criteria online. Candidates have to check the information booklet for TS Polycet eligibility criteria 2024. The eligibility criteria of TS Polycet comprise nationality, domicile, qualifying exam, and age limit. Candidates need to meet the eligibility conditions to appear for the TS Polycet 2024. Moreover, candidates who fulfil the eligibility criteria shall be able to complete the registration process. Below are the eligibility criteria of TS Polycet 2024.

TS Polycet eligibility criteria

Nationality: The candidate must be a citizen of  India.

Domicile: Candidates must be the domicile of Telangana/Andhra Pradesh.

Qualifying Exam: 

  • Candidates must have passed the SSC board exam held by the State Board of Secondary Education, Andhra Pradesh/ Telangana with a minimum aggregate of 35% marks and must have studied mathematics as one of the papers.

  • Candidates who have passed class 10 from the board equivalent to SBSE, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh with a minimum of 35% marks each in physics, chemistry, and mathematics

Age limit: There will be no age limit to appear in the exam.

application_process.html_content:
SBTET concluded the TS Polycet 2024 exam application form online at the official website. The authority has announced the TS Polycet 2024 registration dates online. The application process of TS Polycet comprises steps such as registration, login, fee payment, form filling, print application, and download hall ticket. Candidates must check the eligibility criteria before applying online. Check the steps to fill out the TS POLYCET 2024 application form given below.

How to fill TS POLYCET application form 2024

  • Registration: Complete the registration process by providing valid details. Moreover, candidates have to verify their contact details. 

  • Pay fee: Candidates have to log in using their registered number or mobile number and password. Make the payment of the TS Polycet application fee. The application fee for general category candidates is Rs. 500 (Rs. 250 for SC/ST candidates).

TS Polycet 2024 exam fees

Category

Fees

General

Rs. 500

SC/ST

Rs. 250

  • Fill the application form: After the completion of the application fee payment, candidates have to fill out the application form. Candidates have to provide personal details, communication details, category details, and exam centre and upload the photo and signature. 

  • Print hall ticket: After filling out the application form, generate the hall ticket and download the same for the exam.  

Documents required to upload in TS POLYCET 2024 application form

Candidates will have to upload the following documents at the time of filling out the TS POLYCET application form.

  • Domicile Certificate (mandatory).

  • Proof for Date of Birth (mandatory).

  • Non-Creamy Layer Certificate/Community Certificate (if applicable).

  • Special Reservation Certificate (if applicable).

  • Income Certificate (if applicable).

  • 10+2 exam certificate or equivalent

  • Scanned copy of your recent passport-sized photograph.

  • Scanned copy of your signature.

  • Aadhar card as proof of age.

preparation_tips.html_content:
Below are a few preparation tips that candidates can refer to for preparing for the TS Polycet entrance exam. 

  • Know the exam syllabus and pattern. The syllabus will help in knowing the most important topics on the basis of which the question paper will be prepared while the exam pattern help in understanding the structure of the exam. 

  • Prepare a timetable and follow it strictly

  • Make notes while studying. Understand the topic rather than mug up. Moreover, make handy notes of the formula for quick revision

  • Revise the topics on a regular basis. 

  • Take a mock test and solve the previous year's question paper to check your knowledge.  

Best books for preparation of TS POLYCET 2024

Physics: 

  1. Pradeep's Science Physics for class 10th by K.L. Gomber & Surindra Lal

  2. Lakhmir Singh Physics for class 10 by Manjit Kaur & Lakhmir singh

Chemistry: 

  1. Pradeep's Science Chemistry for class 10th by Dr. S.N. Dhawan & Dr. S.C. Kheterpal

  2. Lakhmir Singh Chemistry for class 10 by Manjit Kaur & Lakhmir singh

Maths: 

  1. Mathematics for Class 10 by R.D. Sharma

  2. Secondary School Mathematics for Class 10 by R.S. Aggarwal

admit_card.html_content:
The authority has released the TS Polycet hall ticket online. Candidates can download the hall ticket for TS Polycet online at the official website through TS Polycet registration details. Applicants who successfully submit the TS Polycet application form before the last date shall be able to download the TS Polycet hall ticket. To download the hall ticket candidates have to provide the login details. TS Polycet hall ticket 2024 is an important document to carry on the day of the exam. 

How to download the TS POLYCET 2024 Admit Card

  • Visit the TS Polycet official website

  • Click on the TS hall ticket download link 

  • Enter the login credentials 

  • The hall ticket will display 

  • Check the details and take the print of the hall ticket.

Details printed on the TS POLYCET 2024 Admit Card

Candidates can check the following details on their admit card,

  • Candidate's Name

  • Roll Number

  • Application Number

  • TS POLYCET 2024 Exam Date & Time

  • Venus of Exam Centre

  • Photograph

  • Signature

TS POYCET 2024 Exam Day Guidelines

  • Candidates are advised to carry print copy of TS POLYCET admit card at the examination centre.

  • The candidates should carry an original photo ID proof along with recent passport-size photographs and a blue ballpoint pen.

  • The candidates are advised to not any prohibited items in the examination centre such as pencil, correction fluid, eraser, calculator, logarithm table, mobile phones, electronic gadgets, etc.

  • Candidates must arrive 30 minutes early at the examination center before the reporting time.

  • Candidates will be allowed to leave the exam hall before the end of the TS POLYCET 2024 examination.

cutoffs.html_content:
SBTET will release the TS Polycet 2024 cutoff online at the official website. Candidates appearing for the TS Polycet entrance exam will be able to check the cutoff of TS Polycet online. The minimum qualifying mark required for admission to the participating institutes is the TS Polycet cutoff. Moreover, the TS Polycet cutoff will be available in the form of opening and closing ranks. Higher the rank, high the chances of admission to the preferred courses and institutes. TS Polycet cutoff will be based on various factors. 

TS POLYCET Cutoff 2024 - Determining Factors

The cutoff will be determined on the various parameters like 

  • The number of candidates who appeared for the exam

  • Difficulty level of exam

  • Marks secured in the exam 

  • Candidates category

  • Previous year cutoff trend

  • Number of seats available in the colleges

counselling_process.html_content:
SBTET, Telangana has announced the TS Polycet 2024 seat allotment result for the special phase on July 31, 2024. The counselling schedules of TS Polycet 2024 are released on the official website. Candidates who qualify the TS Polycet exam are eligible to participate in the counselling process. The TS Polycet counselling process comprises steps such as payment of processing fee, slot booking, document verification, registration, option entry and print list of saved options. The allotment of seats will be done on the basis of the choice made and the availability of seats. Candidates have to lock their seats and appear for document verification.

Candidates must note that the TS POLYCET seat allotment for reserved category candidates will be done separately as per respective rank lists.

Steps to apply for TS POLYCET 2024 Counselling Registration Process

  1. Online Registration - Candidates will have to register themselves for the TS POLYCET counselling by filling out the registration form. Candidates will have to log in to the website using their Application Number and Password. 

  2. Filling the Options - After filling the basic details, candidates will have to fill in the choice of colleges and courses. However, they can edit their options before the last date of the counselling registration. 

  3. Review and Take Printout - Take the printout of the counselling registration for admission purposes.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
SBTET, Telangana State, has released the TS Polycet 2024 exam pattern on its notification. Candidates can check the information booklet for the TS Polycet exam pattern. The exam pattern of TS Polycet will help the candidates to know about the exam. TS Polycet exam pattern consists of details such as types of questions, number of questions, marking scheme, duration of exam, and much more. The authority conducts the TS Polycet exam in offline mode. The duration of the test is 2 hours 30 minutes. There will be a total of 120 questions of multiple choice. No negative marking will be done for the wrong attempt.

exam_name: DCET - Diploma Common Entrance Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Karnataka Diploma CET Exam 2024: KEA commenced post allotment DCET 2024 admission process on July 22, 2024. Candidates can select choices, download the challan and pay the fee through the updated link at cetonline.karnataka.gov.in. The DCET admission process will conclude on July 25, 2024. Candidates who opt for choice 1 will have to report to the allotted institute by July 26, 2024. Karnataka Examination Authority released the final DCET seat allotment on July 22 on the official website. Candidates require their CET number to check the DCET seat allotment 2024. Moreover, the Karnataka DCET cutoff 2024 for round 1 is available online. Candidates who have qualified the Karnataka DCET 2024 exam have been allotted seats. 

The Karnataka DCET web options entry concluded on July 18, 2024. DCET document verification process was held from July 2 to 8. Karnataka DCET 2024 result was declared on June 29, 2024. The Karnataka DCET 2024 exam was conducted on June 22, 2024 for all programs. The authority released the provisional DCET 2024 answer key online on June 24, 2024. Moreover, candidates could object to the DCET answer key 2024 by logging in to the candidate portal using their application number and password. The last date to object to the provisional DCET 2024 answer key was June 26, 2024. 

The authority issued the DCET 2024 admit card on June 12, 2024. The DCET admit card link was available on the official website. Candidates were able to download the admit card for DCET 2024 from June 12 to 22, 2024. The last date for submitting the DCET 2024 application form was May 23, 2024. The authority released the Karnataka DCET 2024 application form on April 30, 2024. DCET 2024 seat matrix has been released on the official website. The candidates are advised to check the official DCET 204 eligibility criteria on the official notification. To be eligible for the Karnataka DCET 2024 exam, candidates should have passed a diploma or equivalent exam from a recognized institution with a minimum of 45% marks in the 5th and 6th semesters combined.

Candidates were advised to regularly solve mock tests to understand the types of questions asked in the exam. Solving DCET mock tests and previous years' questions boosts performance and preparation progress. This practice also helps candidates identify their weak topics and mistakes, ensuring they do not repeat them during the exam.

Karnataka DCET 2024 Latest News and Updates

  • DCET 2024 admission process begins.

  • DCET 2024 post allotment schedule published.

  • DCET final seat allotment result for first round out.

  • DCET first round provisional seat allotment result declared.

  • KEA has published the first round DCET cutoff online.

  • DCET web options entry concluded.

  • DCET 2024 web options entry extended.

  • DCET mock seat allotment released. 

  • The authority has announced the DCET 2024 result on June 29, 2024.

  • KEA has released the provisional DCET 2024 answer key on June 24, 2024.

  • Karnataka DCET exam conducted on June 22, 2024

  • The authority has issued the DCET 2024 admit card on June 12, 2024.

  • The authority has announced the DCET 2024 exam date.

  • The authority has concluded the DCET 2024 registration process on May 31, 2024.

  • The authority has released the DCET 2024 seat matrix on May 21, 2024.

  • The authority has reopened the DCET 2024 registration process on May 20, 2024.

  • The authority concluded the DCET 2024 registration process on May 15, 2024.

  • The authority has commenced the DCET 2024 registration process on April 30, 2024.

  • The authority has announced the DCET 2024 registration dates.

  • The Karnataka DCET 2024 exam date will be announced along with the release of the official notification.

What is Karnataka DCET ?

Karnataka Examination Authority (KEA) conducts DCET 2024 for admission to second-year Engineering courses and for first-year Architecture courses under the Lateral Entry Scheme for both day and evening colleges across the state. The Karnataka DCET exam will be conducted only in online mode (computer-based).

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The exam conducting authorities has released the Karnataka DCET 2024 eligibility criteria along with the official notification. The candidates appearing for the exam must check the eligibility criteria of Karnataka DCET before filling the application form. Karnataka DCET 2024 eligibility criteria comprises qualifying examination, minimum marks required and others. 

Eligibility for BE Courses (Day Engineering Institutions)

  • Candidates are required to pass the diploma or equivalent exam.

  • Candidates with a minimum of 45% marks in the 5th and 6th semesters combined are eligible to fill the applications respectively

  •  The minimum percentage mark for SC/ST candidates is 40%

Eligibility for BE Courses (Evening Engineering Institutions)

  •  Candidates are required to pass the diploma or equivalent exam

  •  Candidates with a minimum of 45% marks in the 5th and 6th semesters combined are eligible to fill the applications respectively

  • The minimum percentage mark for SC/ST candidates is 40%

Eligibility for BArch First Year (Only in Day Engineering College)

  • Candidates must have passed a diploma or equivalent exam from a recognized institute

  • Candidates with a 50% aggregate score in all the subjects of the final year along with 40% marks in NATA 2024.

Reservation Quota

  • Admissions under the reserved category will be made in favour of the candidates belonging to the Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes and Other Backward Classes of citizens under categories 1, 2A, 2B, 3A and 3B in accordance with the Government Order No.

Other Reserved Category

  • (I) Candidates who have participated in Republic Day Camp conducted by the Director-General of NCC, New Delhi from Karnataka and who possess ‘B’ Certificate obtained during the five year period of study in Karnataka between 8th and 12th standards;

          or

  • (ii) The candidates who have participated in the following camps conducted by the Director-General of NCC, New Delhi from Karnataka and who possess ‘B’ Certificate obtained during the five-year period of study in Karnataka between 8th and 12th standards namely;

  • (a) All India Thal Sainik Camp (Boys) - TSC(B)

  • (b)All India Thal Sainik Camp (Girls) - TSC (G)

  • (c) All India Nau Sainik Camp – NSC

  • (d)All India Vayu Sainik Camp – VSC

  • (e) Cadets who have been finally selected as a part of DG NCC team to participate in All India Movalankar Shooting Championship at National Level AND Youth Exchange Programmes and Foreign Naval Cruise organized by DG, NCC.

application_process.html_content:
The exam authorities concluded the Karnataka DCET application form 2024 on May 31, 2024. Candidates could check the eligibility criteria before applying for DCET 2024. The candidates had to first register for the Karnataka DCET followed by payment of fees, entry of details, and declaration. Candidates have to upload the scanned documents as per the required specifications and then choose the preferred exam centres. After filling out the application of Karnataka DCET 2024, the candidates will have to take the printout of the final application form. 

How to apply for Karnataka DCET 2024 Application Form?

Candidates have to fill the Karnataka DCET 2024 application in two phases.

Phase 1

  • Visit the official website and click on “DCET-2024 UG Online Application”.

  • Click on “New User? Click Here to Register. '' Enter the basic details like name, mobile number, email Id, gender, etc. After successful registration, candidates will receive Application number and User ID on their registered mobile number and email. 

  • A login prompt will be displayed on the screen. Login using User Id and password

  • On successful login, “Student information” will be displayed on the screen. Candidates will have to fill all the required details.

  • After entering all the student information, Click on the “Save” button.

  • Next, candidates will have to enter educational details and click on “Save and Continue”.

  • Finally upload a scanned image of Photograph, signature and left hand thumb impression.

Phase 2 

In phase 2 candidates have to read and understand the declaration and finally click on the “Submit” button.

  • After completing the application form the candidates will receive application number and password on their registered email.

  • Take a print out of the challan and pay the application fee in designated bank branches. The challan will be in triplicate; the bank will retain one copy with it and return copies to the candidates.

  • Upload the scanned copy of recent passport size Colour Photograph and Signature in JPG / JPEG format.

  • Candidates have to take print out of the application form, affix their recent photograph and put signature and thumb impression in the designated space. After this, the candidate will have to obtain Principal seal and signature from the college where they have studied their final year diploma on the space provided in the printed form. The printed application will be required at the time of verification along with the copy of challan.

DCET 2024 Application Fee

Category

Application Fee

General and OBC Category (Karnataka State only)

Rs 650

SC/ST category-1 students of Karnataka origin

Rs 500

preparation_tips.html_content:
The candidates preparing for DCET 2024 must follow the exam preparation tips mentioned below. 

  • Know Exam Pattern and Syllabus - Having understanding of the official exam pattern and syllabus of DCET 2024 will help aspirants to prepare for the entrance exam well. Knowing types of questions, no. of questions, subject topics will get the idea of what needs to be covered. 

  • Mock Tests - Candidates are advised to solve mock tests on the regular basis to know what types of questions asked in the exam. Solving the mock test of DCET and previous year questions will definitely help to boost the performance and preparation progress. This will also help the candidates to know their weak topic and mistakes so that the same is not made during the exam.

  • Timetable - Making a study time table and following it regularly will help candidates to prepare for the exam in a well-prepared manner.

  • Revision - Make notes and revise daily so that you have a list of all important key points to revise one day before the exam.

admit_card.html_content:
The authorities has released the DCET 2024 admit card in online mode, at the official website. Candidates can download the admit card of DCET using the application number and candidate's name. The admit card have information related to the candidate’s name, paper, date of birth, gender, test centre name category, etc. In case of any issues, candidates can contact the officials immediately after taking a printout of the same.

How to download the DCET 2024 Admit Card?

  • Visit the official website.

  • Click on the Karnataka DCET 2024 admit card link.

  • Enter the login credentials.

  • DCET admit card 2024 will be displayed on the screen.

  • Download the admit card and take a print out.

Details Mentioned in Karnataka Diploma CET 2024 Admit Card

The following are the details that will appear on the Hall Ticket of the Karnataka Diploma CET : 

  • Candidates name 

  • Signature of the candidates

  •  Candidates photograph

  •  Application number

  •  Exam Schedule

  •  Roll number

  • Subjects

  •  Exam Venue 

  • General instructions

counselling_process.html_content:
KEA has announced the final DCET seat allotment result online on the official website. The allotment of seats has been made based on the candidate's merit in the exam, choice filled and the availability of seats. Candidates who have qualified the DCET exam are eligible to participate in the counselling of DCET 2024. Candidates had to apply for the Karnataka counselling registration followed by the document verification process. The detailed DCET counselling process is mentioned below.

DCET 2024 Counselling Procedure

  • Document Verification- Candidates have to visit the allotted centres for document verification according to the schedule. Candidates have to report to the centre with all the original documents. Candidates will have to carry a “Verification Slip” after the verification process and a “Unique Keyword” will be mentioned on the verification slip.

  • Option Entry- In the option entry process candidates have to select the choices of colleges and courses. Candidates will be allowed to enter as many choices before the last date.

  • Seat Allotment- Based on the marks secured by candidates, and options locked by the candidates, the authorities release the DCET 2024 seat allotment result. Qualified candidates will have to report to the allotted college and pay the fee and not satisfied candidates have to wait for the next round of counselling.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The candidates applying for the Karnataka DCET 2024 exam must have detailed knowledge of the exam pattern of the Karnataka DCET 2024. The authorities has released the DCET 2024 exam pattern along with the official notification. The Karnataka DCET 2024 exam pattern consists of a type of questions, number of questions, sections of the exam, duration of exam, examination mode etc. Understanding the exam pattern and syllabus of DCET 2024 will help candidates develop a strategy to crack the exam.

faqs.question: What is DCET 2024 exam date?
faqs.answer: DCET 2024 exam date was June 22, 2024.

faqs.question: When will the DCET 2024 application form be released?
faqs.answer: The DCET 2024 application form was released on April 30, 2024.

faqs.question: Is DCET conducted in online or offline mode?
faqs.answer: DCET is conducted in offline mode as a Pen and Paper test. Students have to record their response in OMR sheets.

faqs.question: Is there negative marking in the DCET 2024 exam?
faqs.answer: No, there is no negative marking in the DCET exam.

faqs.question: How to download the admit card of DCET 2024?
faqs.answer: The admit card of DCET 2024  available in online mode only. Candidates have to download their admit card from the official website of DCET using their application number and password.

faqs.question: How can I download the answer key of DCET 2024?
faqs.answer: Candidates can download the DCET 2024 answer key in online mode through the official website.

faqs.question: Where can I check the DCET 2024 result?
faqs.answer: The result of DCET 2024 link is available at the official website - kea.kar.nic.in.

exam_name: ATIT - Admission Test for IcfaiTech
conducting_body: ICFAI Foundation for Higher Education, Hyderabad

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
ATIT 2025 - IFHE, Hyderabad commenced the ATIT 2025 registration on September 5, 2024. Candidates can fill out the ATIT application form 2025 on the official website ifheindia.org. Students who have qualified/are appearing in class 12 or equivalent exams and have a minimum of 60% marks are eligible to appear for the ICFAI ATIT exam 2025. The last date to submit the ATIT application form for phase 1 is December 19, 2024. The last for phase 2 registration is April 17, 2025. The authority has announced the ATIT 2025 exam dates for both phases online. ICFAI will conduct the ATIT exam for phase 1 from December 21 to 26, 2024 while the phase 2 exam will be held from April 19 to 27, 2025. To prepare for the exam, candidates must refer to the ATIT syllabus 2025. 

Applicants who complete the ATIT registration 2025 before the due date will be issued the ATIT admit card. The admit card will include the candidate's details, allotted exam date, exam timings and more. The ATIT 2025 question paper will be divided into 5 sections - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English and Logical Reasoning. 

Students who appear in the entrance exam will be able to download their scorecards from the website. To check the ATIT result 2025, candidates require their application number and date of birth. Only qualified candidates will be eligible to participate in the counselling and seat allotment process. 

About ICFAI ATIT Exam

The ICFAI Foundation for Higher Education (IFHE) Hyderabad conducts the Admission Test for IcfaiTech (ATIT), for admission in the B.Tech programmes. The admission Test for IcfaiTech (ATIT) is a university-level entrance exam. Candidates qualifying ATIT 2025 exam will be eligible to participate in the counselling process. ICFAI also accepts scores of JEE Main / State level entrance exam/ national level entrance exam for admissions to its B.Tech courses across the campuses. The following campuses will offer admissions through ATIT 2025:

  • ICFAI University, Jaipur

  • ICFAI University, Raipur

  • ICFAI University, Dehradun

  • ICFAI University, Jharkhand

  • IFHE Hyderabad

highlights.value: ICFAI Foundation for Higher Education, Hyderabad

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
ICFAI Foundation for Higher Education has released the ATIT 2025 eligibility criteria on the official website. Candidates who wish to appear for the ATIT 2025 exam must check the eligibility criteria. The ATIT eligibility criteria mention the minimum conditions required to sit for the exam. All applicants are advised to check the ATIT eligibility criteria 2025 before filling out the application form. The ATIT 2025 eligibility criteria is mentioned below:

  • Aspirants, for B.Tech programs, should have passed Class 12 or its equivalent exam with Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English subjects with at least 60% or above aggregate marks.

  • Students awaiting the final result of the qualifying exam are also eligible to apply for ATIT 2025. Admissions of such candidates will be confirmed after receiving a copy of the qualifying exam certificate along with the original document within the stipulated deadline.

Note: For ICFAI University, Himachal Pradesh BTech admissions, candidates should have passed Class 12 or its equivalent exam with Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English subjects with at least 55% or above aggregate marks.

application_process.html_content:
The exam conducting authorities have released the ATIT application form 2025 in online mode at ifheindia.org. Candidates can submit the ATIT 2025 application form in both online and offline modes.  Applicants who submit the ATIT application form before the due date will be able to appear for the exam. The step-by-step procedure to fill out the application form for ATIT 2025 is provided below:

How to Apply for ICFAI ATIT 2025?

Online Mode - Candidates have to visit the official website and register in order to fill out the ATIT exam form 2025 online. Applicants have to pay the ATIT 2025 application fee of Rs. 500 using Internet banking/Debit/Credit card. They will also need to upload coloured photographs and submit the form.

Offline option - Candidates can obtain the offline form of ATIT 2025 from campus. The ATIT application form 2025 can also be downloaded from the website. A duly filled ATIT registration 2025 form has to be sent to the Admissions Office along with the Demand Draft (DD) in favor of "IFHE- Prospectus Fee A/c ATIT 2025" attached therewith. The ATIT 2025 application will be accepted only if the DD is also received. Candidates need to send the same via post to the following address:

Admissions Officer (B.Tech. Program)

ATIT Office, Plot # 65, Nagarjuna Hills,

Punjagutta, Hyderabad-500082, Telangana State.

Ph: 040-23440967, Toll Free: 1800-599-0767

E-mail: btechadmissions@icfaiuniversity.in

admit_card.html_content:
After the ATIT 2025 slot booking, candidates can download the admit card online. Candidates will have to log in to the candidate portal to access the ATIT 2025 admit card. The login credentials required to download the ATIT admit card 2025 are the application number and password. The ATIT admit card will comprise details about the exam date, time, candidate's roll number, exam guidelines and more. 

Steps to download ATIT 2025 admit card 

  • Go to the official website of ATIT 2025.

  • Candidates will have to complete the slot booking procedure.

  • The admit card will be generated.

  • Downloading and printing out of the admit card has to be done by the candidates after checking for any mistakes in it.

counselling_process.html_content:
Aspirants declared qualified in the ATIT 2025 exam will be called to participate in the counselling process. All such candidates will have to download the call letter for counselling which specifies the time, date and venue for the ATIT counselling 2025.

Candidates must indicate their preferred campus and branch while registering for ATIT 2025 counselling. They must carry the requisite documents in original for verification as specified by the University and attend the counselling in person. After allotment of seats, they are required to verify the seat by paying the specified admission fee.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The Admission Test for IcfaiTech 2025 will be conducted for 120 minutes i.e. 2 hours. The ATIT 2025 question paper will contain 120 questions from five subjects namely Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English and Logical Reasoning. The authority has released the ATIT exam pattern 2025 online. Students must refer to the ATIT exam pattern while preparing for the exam. 

ATIT Exam Pattern 2025

Particulars

Details

Mode of Examination

Computer Based Test

Duration

2 Hours ( 3 sessions per day)

Section-wise Distribution of Questions

  • Physics - 25 Questions

  • Chemistry - 20 Questions

  • Mathematics - 35 Questions

  • English - 20 Questions

  • Logical Reasoning - 20 Questions

Total Number of Questions

120 Questions

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at ATIT 2025 counselling
documents: Proof of ATIT score /JEE Main score
Completion certificate from concerned board for qualifying exam

faqs.question: How can I download the admit card of ATIT 2025?
faqs.answer: Candidates will be able to download the ATIT admit cards 2024 from the official website after completing the slot booking process.

faqs.question: What is the ATIT application fee 2025?
faqs.answer: The application fee for ATIT 2025 is Rs 500.

faqs.question: How can I fill ATIT application form 2025 in offline mode?
faqs.answer: For applying in offline mode, candidates have to obtain the ATIT 2025 application form online, download it and send the filled application along with a demand draft of Rs 500 payable at Hyderabad.

faqs.question: How can I apply for ICFAI Tech ATIT 2025?
faqs.answer: Candidates who seek admission through ATIT 2025 can apply either through the online or offline mode.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for ATIT 2025?
faqs.answer: Candidates appearing for the ATIT 2025 exam for B.Tech admissions must passed 10+2 or equivalent examination with 60% aggregate marks and Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English as compulsory subjects. Candidates appearing for class 12 qualifying exams can also apply for ATIT 2025.

exam_name: SonaEEE - Sona Engineering Entrance Exam
conducting_body: Sona College of Technology Salem Tamilnadu

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
SonaEEE 2025- Sona College of Technology, Salem, Tamilnadu will publish the SonaEEE 2025 notification on the official website. The various details about the SonaEEE 2025 exam will be available in the information brochure. The authority will announce the dates for the SonaEEE 2025 registration on the official website. The link for the SonaEEE registration will be available on the official website.  The SonaEEE 2025 registration process will include initial registration, filling the application form and payment of the application fee. Before applying for the exam, candidates must ensure they meet the SonaEEE eligibility criteria 2025. The authority will announce the SonaEEE 2025 exam dates on the official website. Once the exam is concluded, the authority will announce the SonaEEE 2025 result on the official website.

About SonaEEE

Sona Engineering Entrance Exam (SonaEEE) is a National level Engineering Entrance Exam conducted by Sona College of Technology, Salem, Tamilnadu for admissions to various BE/B.Tech courses that are offered by the institution.

application_process.html_content:

exam_name: JLEE - Assam Joint Lateral Entry Examination

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Assam JLEE 2024 - DTE Assam has released the round 2 seat allotment for JLEE 2024 online. Candidates need to download the Assam JLEE seat allotment 2024 through login at dte.assam.gov.in. Eligible students must report to the allotted college as per the data and time mentioned in the allotment letter. The round 1 Assam JLEE 2024 seat allotment result was uploaded on August 29, 2024. The authority concluded the Assam JLEE 2024 counselling registration on August 22, 2024. Candidates who qualified the Assam JLEE 2024 exam were able to participate in the counselling process. The Assam JLEE counselling is based on the candidate's merit in the exam and the choices filled. The authority held two rounds of the Assam JLEE counselling.

Assam Science and Technological University (ASTU) announced the Assam JLEE 2024 result on August 5, 2024. The authority has updated the Assam JLEE result 2024 link on the official website, website, astu.ac.in. To access the JLEE 2024 result candidates have to provide the login credentials such as application no. / username and password. The authority concluded the objection window for Assam JLEE 2024 answer key on July 25, 2024. The authority conducted the Assam JLEE 2024 exam in offline mode.

The Assam JLEE 2024 answer key will be released on July 23, 2024. The authority conducted the Assam JLEE 2024 exam on July 21. Candidates need to carry the JLEE admit card and a valid id proof to the exam centre. Assam JLEE 2024 admit card was released on July 12. Registered candidates who wish to appear for the Assam Joint Lateral Entry Exam can find the JLEE admit card through the login portal. The authority conducted the Assam JLEE application form from June 21 to July 8. Candidates who submitted the Assam JMEE 2024 application form before the last date can appear for the Assam JMEE exam. To prepare for the exam, candidates must be aware of the JLEE paper pattern and syllabus. 

Assam JLEE Latest news and updates

  • Assam JLEE 2024 round 2 seat allotment out.
  • Seat allotment of Assam JLEE 2024 round 1 released on August 29. 
  • Assam JLEE 2024 counselling registration concluded.
  • Assam JLEE counselling registration started.
  • DTE Assam has announced the Assam JLEE 2024 counselling schedule online.
  • ASTU announced the Assam JLEE 2024 scorecard on August 5, 2024.
  • ASTU released the Assam JLEE 2024 provisional answer key on July 23, 2024.
  • ASTU issued the Assam JLEE 2024 admit card on July 12, 2024. 
  • ASTU concluded the Assam JLEE 2024 registration process on July 8, 2024.
  • The authority extended the registration last date for Assam JLEE 2024 to July 8, 2024.
  • ASTU commenced the Assam JLEE 2024 registration process on June 21, 2024.
  • ASTU has released the exam notification online. 

About the Assam JLEE exam 

Assam Science and Technology University conducts the Joint Lateral Entry Examination (JLEE) for admissions directly to the third semester of B.E/BTech programs in Assam Engineering College, Jorhat Engineering College, Jorhat Institute of Science and Technology, Bineswar Brahma Engineering College, Girijinanda Institute of Management and Technology. The Assam JLEE is a state-level exam that will be held as pen-and-paper having 100 multiple-choice questions (MCQs) with a duration of 3 hours.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
ASTU has released the Assam JLEE 2024 eligibility criteria online at official website. Candidates need to check the information brochure for Assam  JLEE eligibility criteria 2024. The eligibility criteria of Assam JLEE 2024 comprises of domicile, nationality, education qualification and much more. Candidates who fulfil the minimum Assam JLEE eligibility criteria 2024 can apply for Assam Joint Lateral Entry Exam.  Here is the detailed eligibility of the Assam JLEE exam: 

  • It is mandatory for the candidates that they must have passed a recognized diploma with a minimum 3 years duration from any polytechnic institution affiliated to State Council of Technical Education (SCTE), Assam. 

  • Candidates must have scored a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST) in their diploma exam.

  • Only permanent residents of Assam will be allowed to participate in the Assam JLEE exam. 

  • Candidates appearing in the final exams of their diploma course can also appear for the exam but have to submit their original mark sheet along with the passing certificate of the final diploma as stipulated. 

  • Students of Central Institute of Plastics Engineering and Technology (CIPET) and Assam Energy Institute, Sivasagar are also eligible for JLEE-2024

application_process.html_content:
The Assam JLEE 2024 application form process concluded on July 8, 2024, online, at astu.ac.in. Candidates who wish to appear for the Assam Joint Lateral Entry Exam must complete the registration of Assam JLEE 2024 before the last date. The application process comprises registration, form filling, uploading of documents and payment of JLEE application fees. Candidates must follow the steps mentioned to fill out the Assam JLEE application form 2024. 

Steps to fill the Assam JLEE 2024 application form

Fill the application form - Candidates need to enter their `details like name, parent’s name, date of birth (age as of July 1, 2023), permanent residence proof of Assam, address, nationality, category, and preferred exam centres. 

Upload essential documents - Candidates will be required to upload the following documents in a specified format issued by the authorities. 

Image Detail

Pay online Assam JLEE application fee - After filling the application form, candidates need to pay the application fees using the mode available. Candidates have to pay the application fee of Rs. 1500 in online mode only. Candidates can pay the fee through net banking/credit card/debit card. 

Note: Instead of sending a copy of the JLEE application form 2024 or any other document to the authorities, candidates must take a printout of the filled-in application form. 

The candidates need to note down the application form number/user ID and password to download the admit card, check results, and more. If a candidate forgets his/her password, then he/she can retrieve the password by clicking on the “Forgot Password” button.

preparation_tips.html_content:
• Candidates appearing for the Assam JLEE exam are advised to go through the syllabus and exam pattern beforehand. 

  • It is advisable to solve as many JLEE mock tests as possible to achieve the time management required during the exam. 

  • Applicants have to make sure they understand the fundamentals of every topic from the syllabus. Many times the questions asked in the exams are from the basic principles. 

  • Candidates are advised to refer to the Assam JLEE best books while studying. 

  • Making short notes while studying and revising them during the last days is highly beneficial. Hence, candidates should make sure they create short notes during preparation.

admit_card.html_content:
ASTU released the Assam JLEE 2024 admit card on July 12, 2024. The link for the JLEE admit card download is updated at, astu.ac.in. The admit card of Assam JLEE 2024 is available for the candidates who fill out the application form before the last date. To access the admit card online, candidates have to provide the login credentials. Here are the steps to download the admit card.

Steps to download the JLEE admit card 2024

  • First, visit the Assam JLEE official website.

  • Click on the “Assam JLEE admit card” link appearing on the screen. 

  • Enter log-in credentials such as application form number/user ID and password. 

  • After a successful login, the admit card will be displayed. 

  • Download the admit card and take a printout for future reference. 

Candidates are advised to carry their admit card on the examination day. Those candidates who will be found without the JLEE 2024 admit card will not be allowed to enter the exam centres. Candidates are advised to keep it safe for the counselling round and admission process.

Details mentioned on the JLEE admit card: 

  • Name of the candidate

  • Category 

  • Exam centre address

  • Exam instructions 

  • Application number 

  • Photograph and signature 

  • Examination schedule (Date and Time)

cutoffs.html_content:
Assam JLEE cutoff is the minimum marks that will allow a number of candidates to get admission and a confirmed seat. DTE will announce these marks as it is responsible for holding the Assam JLEE 2024 counselling. 

The DTE will also announce a waitlist. The cutoff of JLEE 2024 will be separate for each branch and will be announced for each round of counselling. Candidates whose marks and roll numbers are announced will have to attend the JLEE counselling 2024 on the specified date. Candidates can go through the previous years' cutoff to garner a good idea of the marks required for admissions for each branch.

counselling_process.html_content:
DTE, Assam is conducting the JLEE counselling 2024 in online mode. The authority has announced the Assam JLEE 2024 seat allotment for rounds 1 and 2 on the official website. The Assam JLEE counselling registration concluded on August 22, 2024. The JLEE 2024 counselling is being conducted in two rounds for candidates who have qualified the entrance exam. The steps involved in the Assam JLEE counselling are as follows:

Registration: Candidates will have to pay a non-refundable counselling fee of Rs. 600, followed by registering for the counselling process. 

Choice of Institute: Candidates have to select their preferred institute. 

Verification of Documents: It is important for the candidate to carry all the important documents and get them verified before admission. 

Seat allotment: As soon as all the above steps have been completed successfully, the authorities will allot seats to the candidates on the basis of their merit and choice of institute. They need to pay the admission fee and confirm their admission. 

Second round of Assam JLEE counselling: This round of counselling will be held for the vacant seats left after round 1. DTE Assam will publish a merit list of all candidates who will be qualified and will be eligible for admission to attend the same.

exam_name: TMISAT - Tolani Martime Institute Science Aptitude Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
TMISAT 2024 - Tolani Maritime Institute commenced the TMISAT 2024 registration process on December 28, 2023. The authority has updated the TMISAT application form 2024 link on the website, tmi.tolani.edu. Candidates who wish to get admission to BTech Marine Engineering and BSc Nautical Science have to apply for TMISAT 2024. Aspirants who have passed class 10+2 with PCM can apply for the Tolani Maritime Institute Science Aptitude Test. The authority will soon announce the TMISAT 2024 exam dates online. To be eligible for admission candidates have to qualify TMISAT and IMU CET.

TMISAT 2024 - Selection Process

Tolani Maritime Institute's selection process will test candidates on each of the below parameters by taking into account a candidate's 10+2 PCM marks, rank in IMU CET, result of the TMI online entrance exam, performance in an interview and satisfactory medical tests.

Parameters Required 

  • Communication skills

  • Temperamental suitability for a sea career

  • Leadership qualities

  • Physical fitness

  • Aptitude for scientific concepts

Based on the scores secured by the candidates, the TMISAT 2024 merit list will be prepared. The shortlisted candidates will have to report for the counselling procedure and in order to be eligible to get the admission, the candidates have to be physically/medically fit.

highlights.value: Tolani Martime Institute Science Aptitude Test

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authority has released the TMISAT 2024 eligibility criteria online at the official website. The eligibility criteria of TMISAT 2024 will consist of the nationality, age limit and education qualification which are required to be met by the candidates to be eligible to get admission into the institute. The eligible candidates will be able to apply for the TMISAT exam 2024. 

The following criteria have to be met to be eligible for admission into the B.Tech. Marine Engineering degree programme at Tolani Maritime Institute:

Age - Male candidates born on or after September 1, 2003, are eligible to apply for the 2024 batch. In accordance with Government of India guidelines, there is a two year age relaxation for female candidates and girls born on or after September 1, 2000 are eligible to apply for the 2024 batch.

Marital Status - Only unmarried candidates are eligible to apply.

Academic Qualifications - Students should have completed the Senior Secondary Examination (10+2) or its equivalent with:

  • At least 60% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics (P C M), and
  • At least 50% marks in English either in Class X or Class XII

Physical Fitness

The Institute has laid down detailed minimum physical fitness and medical standards. The candidate has to meet these standards to qualify for admission. You are advised to have yourself medically examined by competent doctors before applying. This will ensure that you meet the minimum requirements, which in turn will avoid disappointment at a later stage.
Also Read - Medical requirements for admission.

application_process.html_content:
Tolani Marine Maritime Institute has released the TMISAT 2024 application form online at the official website tmi.tolani.edu. The TMISAT application process will comprise of registration, form filling, uploading documents and payment of registration fees. The application form of TMISAT is available in online mode only. Candidates who meet the minimum eligibility conditions can apply for TMISAT 2024. Candidates are required to be ready with the soft copy of documents to upload while filling out the online TMISAT application form 2024.

TMISAT Application Form 2024 - Documents Required 

  • Recent passport-size photograph

  • Class 10 mark sheet

  • Class 12 mark sheet (Candidates appearing for the Class 12 exam in 2024 may submit these copies after the declaration of results.)

  • Leaving / Transfer Certificate / Birth Certificate (For age proof)

  • Passport (if available) Please note that a Passport is mandatory for admission.

TMISAT Application Form 2024 - Steps Involved

TMISAT Registration 2024 - Steps to Apply

STEP 1- Registration: Aspirants first have to register for TMISAT 2024 by entering their personal details such as gender, name, mobile number, email address, date of birth and password. After filling the required details, they will have to click on "Submit" and the details will be sent to the registered mobile and email address. Candidates will then have to validate their account by clicking on the link provided.

STEP 2- Application Form of TMISAT 2024: Once the registration is over, candidates are required to fill the form with the required details so that they can proceed to the next step. In this step, candidates will be required to enter their personal and academic details and address of communication.

STEP 3- Upload Documents: Candidates who have successfully entered the details in the application form have to upload the scanned images of the documents such as recent passport-size photographs, Class 10th Marksheet, Class 12th Marksheet (if available), Transfer Certificate, Birth Certificate or Passport, Caste Certificate (if any), and medical report. After uploading these documents, they will be required to proceed to the payment gateway.

STEP 4- Payment of Application Fees: After successfully uploading all the necessary documents, candidates will be directed to the payment gateway for the payment of application fees. Candidates are required to pay Rs. 1200 through Debit/Credit Card/Net Banking or Demand Draft drawn in favor of "Tolani Maritime Institute" payable at Pune.

STEP 5- Submission of Application Form: After successful payment, candidates have to download the duly filled application form of TMISAT 2024 and get that printed. 

The printed TMISAT application form has to be sent to the postal address along with all necessary documents. Address: "Tolani Maritime Institute, Talegaon-Chakan Road, Induri, Talegaon, Pune- 410507, Maharashtra, India" 

TMISAT Application Form 2024 - Instructions

  • The online application is for admission to programmes offered in Tolani Maritime Institute.

  • The application fee is Non-Refundable.

  • Email ID submitted at the time of registration will be used for all correspondences until enrolment is completed. Change in Email ID will NOT be permitted under any circumstances.

admit_card.html_content:
The institute will release the TMISAT 2024 admit card in online mode. The admit card of TMISAT 2024 will be released only for the registered applicants. To download the TMISAT admit card 2024, students will have to use their application form number and date of birth. The TMISAT admit card is the most important document to carry on the day of the exam. Below is the step to download the TMISAT admit card 20024.

Steps to download the Admit card of TMISAT 2024

  • Visit the official website

  • Candidates will be required to log in using their username and password

  • Admit card will be displayed on the screen

  • Candidates will be required to check the admit card for any errors. If none are there, candidates must download the admit card for further use

counselling_process.html_content:
All the qualified candidates will be called to attend the offline counselling process of TMISAT 2024. Candidates will be required to report at the venue as per the date and time allotted to them in their call letter. Counselling will consist of the document verification followed by the medical test by the DGS and TMI approved doctor. 

Seats will be allotted to the candidates who meet the TMISAT cutoff marks and are medically fit. The qualified candidates will have to pay the required fees if they wish to confirm their admission to the institute.

The authority has released the TMISAT exam pattern 2024 online at the official website. Candidates have to check the official notification to know the exam pattern of TMISAT 2024. exam_name: CITKEE - CIT Kokrajhar Entrance Exam

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CIT Kokrajhar has commenced the CITKEE 2024 registration process on the official website. The authority has updated the CITKEE 2024 registration link on the website, admission.cit.ac.in. The authorities will conduct the CITKEE 2024 on June 9, 2024. B. Tech (Direct Entry): Passed 10+2 examination with Physics/ Mathematics / Chemistry/ Computer Science/Electronics/Information Technology/ Biology/Informatics Practices/ Biotechnology/ Technical Vocational subject/ Agriculture/ Engineering Graphics/ Business Studies/Entrepreneurship (Any of the three). Obtained at least 45% marks (40% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category) in the above subjects taken together.

CIT Kokrajhar is an engineering institute located in Kokrajhar, Assam, India. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in various disciplines of engineering and technology. Candidates can check the official notification which was released on the official website of CIT Kokrajhar or the examination authority for the application process, eligibility criteria, exam pattern, syllabus, and other details. You can also prepare for the exam by referring to previous years' question papers, sample papers, and mock tests.

About CITKEE 2024

CIT Kokrajhar conducts an entrance examination known as CITKEE 2024 for admission into various programmes including Diploma, B.Tech, B.Des, M.Tech, M.Des, and Ph.D. CIT Kokrajhar is a deemed university under the Ministry of Education, Government of India and a centrally funded technical institute.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The eligibility criteria for admission to CIT Kokrajhar 2024 may vary depending on the program. Here are the general eligibility criteria:

  • Diploma: Candidates must have passed HSLC or equivalent with 40% marks in aggregate and 40% of marks in Science, Mathematics (or Advanced Mathematics) and English taken together. (5% relaxation for ST/SC/PWD candidates).

  • Age limit: The age of the candidates as on 01-08-2024 must not exceed the following age limit for different categories- (i) OPEN/OBC-19 years; (ii) SC/ST/PWD-24 years; (iii) Female Candidates-22 years.

  • B.Tech: B. Tech (Direct Entry): Passed 10+2 examination with Physics/ Mathematics / Chemistry/ Computer Science/Electronics/Information Technology/ Biology/Informatics Practices/ Biotechnology/ Technical Vocational subject/ Agriculture/ Engineering Graphics/ Business Studies/Entrepreneurship (Any of the three). Obtained at least 45% marks (40% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category) in the above subjects taken together.

  • Vertical Entry: Diploma in the concerned branch of Engineering/Technology from CIT with overall 65% marks (5% relaxation for SC/ST/PWD). Lateral Entry: Diploma in AICTE recognized related branch of Engineering /Technology with overall 60% marks or equivalent CGPA or B.Sc. (with Mathematics as one of the compulsory subjects) with a minimum of 55% marks or equivalent CGPA (5% relaxation for ST/SC/PWD candidates).

  • AGE LIMIT Direct Entry: Candidates must not be above 21 years, or below 17 years of age as on 01- 08-2024. The upper age limit is relaxed to 3 years for SC/ST/PWD. Lateral Entry: Candidates must not be above 40 years of age as on 01-08-2024 (45 years for SC/ST/PWD and 43 years for OBC and female candidates).

  • B.Des: B. Des (Direct Entry):10+2 (any stream) or equivalent with a minimum of 50% marks in aggregate. (5% relaxation for SC/ST/PWD candidates).

  • Vertical Entry: Diploma in Animation and Multimedia Technology from CITK with 60% overall marks (5% relaxation for SC/ST/PWD).

  • Age limit:  The age of the candidates as on 01-08-2024 must not exceed the following age limit for different categories-(i)OPEN/OBC-19 years;(ii) SC/ST/PWD-24 years;(iii) Female candidates-22 years.

Direct Entry: Candidates must not be above 21 years, or below 17 years of age as on 01- 08-2024. The upper age limit is relaxed to 3 years for SC/ST/PWD candidates. Vertical Entry: Candidates must not be above 40 years of age as on 01-08-2024 (45 years for SC/ST/PWD and 43 years for OBC and female candidates)

application_process.html_content:
The application process for CIT Kokrajhar 2024 has started on March 4, 2024. However, the CIT KEE application form has been released on the official website of the institute.

Candidates who are interested in applying for CIT Kokrajhar 2024 can visit the official website of the institute and follow the instructions given to complete the application process. Candidates will be required to fill in their personal details, educational qualifications, and other necessary information in the application form. It is important to note that candidates must fulfil the eligibility criteria set by the institute before applying for any program. Also, candidates will be required to upload scanned copies of their photograph, signature, and other necessary documents as per the instructions given in the application form.

The application fee for CIT Kokrajhar 2024 will also be specified in the application form. Candidates can pay the application fee through online mode using a credit/debit card or net banking. It is advisable to keep a regular check on the official website of the institute for the latest updates on the application process and other related information.

How to apply CIT Kokrajhar Application form 2024

To apply for CIT Kokrajhar Application Form 2024, candidates need to follow these steps:

  • Visit the official website of CIT Kokrajhar

  • Click on the "Admissions" tab and select "Apply Online."

  • Fill in the required details such as personal information, educational qualifications, and contact details.

  • Upload the scanned copies of your photograph and signature in the prescribed format and size.

  • Pay the application fee through online mode.

  • Verify all the details and submit the application form.

  • Take a printout of the application form and fee receipt for future reference.

Application Fee:

The Application Fee for Various Entrance Schemes are as given below

Diploma

Rs1200/-(600/- for SC/ST/PWD)

admit_card.html_content: The admit card for CIT Kokrajhar Entrance Examination 2024 will be available for download from the CIT admission portal. Candidates will be log in to the portal using their registered email ID and password to download their admit card. It is important to carry the admit card to the examination centre as it serves as a proof of identity and allows the candidate to take the exam.

counselling_process.html_content:
The counselling process for CIT Kokrajhar 2024 admissions will be conducted for the candidates who have qualified the entrance exam and are shortlisted based on their rank in the merit list. Here are the steps involved in the counselling process:

  • Online Registration: Candidates need to register themselves online on the official website of CIT Kokrajhar for counselling.

  • Choice Filling: Candidates must fill in their preferred choices of programs and institutes during the choice filling process.

  • Document Verification: Candidates have to report to the counselling centre along with their original documents for verification. They must carry all the necessary documents in original and photocopy.

  • Seat Allotment: Based on the rank of the candidate in the merit list, availability of seats, and the choices filled by the candidate, seats will be allotted.

  • Reporting: Candidates who have been allotted a seat must report to the allotted institute within the given time frame and complete the admission formalities.

3 Hours

Types of questions

MCQs

Sections

Multiple sections, covering various topics such as physics, chemistry, mathematics, and general aptitude.

Marking scheme

The marking scheme may vary depending on the exam. Generally, correct answers may be awarded marks, while incorrect answers may lead to negative marking.

Syllabus

Class 11 and 12 curriculum of the central and state education boards.

exam_name: CG PET - Chhattisgarh Pre Engineering Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CG PET 2024: DTE Chhatisgarh declared the CG PET 2024 seat allotment for round 2 on August 29, 2024. The authority has updated the CG PET seat allotment link on the official website slcm.cgstate.gov.in. The CG PET 2024 admission process for round 2 will conclude on September 3. The CG PET 2024 registration for round 2 was held from August 22 to 27, 2024. The Directorate of Technical Education, Chhatisgarh conducted the CG PET 2024 counselling round 1 from August 7 to 21. CG PET 2024 counselling date is available on the official website. Candidates shortlisted based on results can participate in the CG PET 2024 counselling process. The seat allotment is based on the rank secured in the qualifying exam, preference of colleges and courses and availability of seats.

The authority declared the CG PET 2024 results on July 26, 2024. The authority has updated the CG PET 2024 on the official website, vyapam.cgstate.gov.in. Candidates can download the final CG PET answer key pdf without requiring any login credentials. The authority released the provisional answer key of CG PET 2024 on June 24. Candidates challenge the answer key of CG PET 2024 by July 1. The authority conducted the CG PET exam 2024 on June 13. Candidates could download the CG PET 2024 admit card from June 5 to 13. Registered candidates had to carry the CG PET admit card 2024 on exam day. Candidates were able to apply for the Chhattisgarh PET 2024 from March 3 to April 7. Moreover, the CG PET form correction window was activated from April 8 to 10. Aspirants can check the detailed CG PET exam date on the official website. 

Candidates under the age of 30, who have passed class 12 or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with Chemistry/ Biology/ Biotechnology/ Technical vocational courses as optional subjects are eligible to apply for the CG PET 2024 exam. CG PET 2024 eligibility criteria also state that candidates should have secured a minimum of 45% (for general candidates) or 40% (for reserved categories) in each subject.

CG PEB will release the CG PET answer key 2024 on the official website. The result of CG PET 2024 is expected to be announced in May 2024. Candidates will be able to check the final CG PET answer key 2024 on the official website. Candidates qualifying the CG PET exam will be eligible to participate in the counselling process.

CG PET 2024 Latest News and Updates

Students can find the latest news and updates of CG PET 2024 here after it is published by the concerned authorities.

  • CG PET2024 seat allotment for round 2 announced.
  • CG PET counselling registration for round 2 commenced.
  • The registration for CG PET counselling 2024 round 1 started.
  • CG PET counselling dates released.
  • CG PET 2024 result was announced on July 26, 2024.
  • CG PET 2024 final answer key was released on July 26, 2024.
  • CG PET 2024 answer key released.
  • CG PET admit card 2024 has been released on June 5.
  • The form correction concluded on April 10.
  • CG PET 2024 registration concluded on April 7.
  • CG PET registration 2024 commenced on March 4.
  • The authority has announced the CG PET 2024 exam date online. The authority will conduct the CG PET exam on June 6, 2024.

CG PET Previous Year Statistics

As per the official notification, a total of 19,820 candidates have registered for the exam. Out of the total registered candidates, a total of 12490 applicants appeared for the exam. For more details, candidates can refer to the table below.

About CG PET 2024 Exam

The Chhattisgarh Professional Examination Board (CPEB) conducts the CG PET exam for admission to various B.Tech courses offered by the participating institutes of CG PET in the state. Admissions will be done based on scores secured by the candidates in the CG PET 2024 entrance exam. CG PET 2024 will be conducted as a pen-paper-based examination. Registered candidates will be able to download the admit card of CG PET with the help of a registration ID and password.

Contact Details:

Helpline: 0771 2972780

Email: helpdesk.cgvyapam@gmail.com

Phone: 91 8269801982 (Call on Holidays for admit card-related queries between 10:00 AM To 5:00 PM )

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
There are certain conditions and requirements that students willing to appear for the CG PET 2024 exam will have to fulfill. Candidates will be able to check the detailed CG PET 2024 eligibility criteria from the official website. Mentioned below is the CG PET eligibility criteria for candidate’s reference:

  • Qualifying examination : Must pass class 12 or equivalent exam from a recognized board with physics and mathematics as the compulsory subjects. Candidates can have chemistry, biotechnology, biology, technical vocational courses as their optional subjects in class 12 or equivalent exam.

  • Qualifying Marks : General category candidates must have a minimum aggregate of 45% marks in the qualifying exam. The reserved category (SC/ST/OBC/female and PWD) should have a minimum aggregate of 40% marks in the qualifying exam.

  • Age Criteria : Applicant should not be less than 17 years as on December 31, 2023. While the upper age limit is 30 years. That is, candidates should not be more than 30 years old as on July 1 of the exam year. For reserved category, there is 3 years relaxation in the upper age limit.

  • Domicile : It is a must to provide a domicile certificate as per the guidelines laid down by the government.

application_process.html_content:
CG PEB has closed the portal for CG PET form correction on May 10. The registered candidates were able to modify the details mentioned on the application form. CG PET 2024 registration last date was April 10. The application form was available online at the official website. Candidates must check the CG PET eligibility conditions before applying for the CG Pre-Entrance Test. 

CG PET 2024 Registration - Things to keep ready

Image        

Dimension        

Format

3.5 cm x 4.5 cm

The file should not be less than 40 KB and not more than 50kb

The file should not be less than 40 KB and not more than 50 KB  

 CG PET 2024 Application Form - Steps to apply

1st Step - CG PET registration: Candidates have to select their choice of course and upload their photograph and signature in the prescribed format and dimensions at the time of Chhattisgarh pre-engineering test (cgpet) registration.

2nd Step - Filling of Application Form: The required personal, contact and academic details have to be provided by the candidates. The choice of exam centre also has to be selected.

3rd Step - Pay CG PET application fee: Pay the required application fee of CG PET 2024 in the preferred mode.  

4th Step: Download submitted CG PET application form - Finally, candidates need to download the application form as a PDF file and take a print out of the same.

admit_card.html_content:
The authorities released the CG PET 2024 admit card in online mode for all the registered candidates. The admit card of CG PET 2024 comprises details like the candidate’s name, exam centre address, time, hall ticket number etc. The CG PET admit card is an important document without which students will not be able to appear in the Chhattisgarh engineering exam. 

Steps to download CG PET 2024 admit card

  • Visit the official website

  • Click on the admit card link (it will be updated)

  • Enter registration number and date of birth

  • Cross-check the details and download CG PET 2024 admit card

  • Take a print out of the admit card on an A4 size sheet.

CG PET admit card 2024 - Details Mentioned 

The followings are the details mentioned on the admit card of CG PET,

  • Candidate's name

  • Guardian or parent name

  • Registration number

  • Exam date and time

  • Exam centre address

  • Candidate’s photograph

  • Candidate’s scanned signature

  • Exam day guidelines

cutoffs.html_content:
The minimum marks or ranks required to get admission into the participating institutes are known as the CG PET 2024 cutoff. While determining the cutoff of CG PET 2024, authorities consider factors like the number of candidates, difficulty level of the qualifying exam, previous year's cutoff trends etc. Authorities released the cutoff for the state and other state candidates separately. The one whose rank is less than the CG PET 2024 cutoff will have fewer chances of admission.
