counselling_process.html_content:
DTE Chhattisgarh has announced the CG PET 2024 seat allotment result for round 2 on August 29, 2024. Candidates can check the CG PET seat allotment 2024 on the official website. The CG PET counselling is being held online in three rounds. The counselling process includes steps like option filling, document verification, fee payment, seat allotment, reporting etc. 

CG PET 2024 seat allotment is based on the ranks obtained by the candidates, seat availability and choices locked by the candidates.

CG PET 2024 Counselling Process:

Candidates can check the detailed procedures of CG PET 2024,

1st Step: Registration - Candidates need to register for CG PET 2024 by providing the necessary details.

2nd Step: Upload required documents - Now, they need to upload the required documents in the specified format.

Documents

File Size

File Format

Photograph

40 KB to 50 KB

JPG/ JPEG

Signature

40 KB to 50 KB

JPG/ JPEG

3rd Step: Fee payment - The CG PET counselling fee can be paid online mode through credit/debit card or internet banking.

4th Step: Choice Locking -

  • The candidates have to fill in the institute's choices and courses as per the schedule. 

  • They will have the option to add, delete, modify and rearrange their choices. 

  • Candidates have to lock their choices before the last date and take a printout along with the filled choices.

5th Step: Document Verification - After the choice locking process is completed, they will have to report to the allotted centres for the document verification process. He/She should bring their original documents along with photocopies to the facility centres. The exam authorities will provide a receipt cum acknowledgement slip to the candidates after the document verification process.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The authorities released the exam pattern of CG PET 2024 along with the brochure. The exam pattern of CG PET 2024 gives information related to the marking scheme, mode of examination, type of questions asked, etc. Mentioned below is the CG PET exam pattern 2024, for the reference of candidates.

CG PET 2024 Exam Pattern

Particulars

Details

Mode of Exam

Offline - Pen and paper-based exam

Duration of Exam

3 hours (180 minutes)

Types of Questions

Objective - Multiple Choice Questions

Sections

As per CG PET syllabus, there will be three sections:

  • Physics

  • Chemistry

  • Mathematics

Total Number of Questions

150 questions

Sectional Distribution of Questions

Physics - 50 questions

Chemistry - 50 questions

Mathematics - 50 questions

Marking Scheme

1 mark shall be awarded for each correct response

Negative Marking

There is no negative marking

Maximum Marks

150 Marks

syllabus.main_exam_title: CG PET 2024 Chhattisgarh Pre Engineering Test 2024

units.topics_html: • Units and dimensions, fundamental and derived units, dimensional analysis, S.I. units
• Linear motion in one and two dimensions, cases of uniform velocity and uniform acceleration, general relation among position and velocity, uniform circulation motion
• Force and inertia, Newton's law of motion, conservation of momentum and energy static, and kinetic friction, uniform circular motion
• Work done by force, energy, power, elastic collisions, potential energy, gravitational potential energy and its angular conversion to kinetic energy, potential energy of a spring

units.syllabus_heading: Rotational motion and moment of inertia
units.topics_html: • Rigid body rotation, couple, torque, angular momentum conservation of its momentum, moment of inertia, theorems of parallel and perpendicular axis (moment of inertia of uniform ring, disc thin rod, and cylinder only)
• Acceleration due to gravity and its variation, universal law of gravitation, motion of satellites, escape velocity, synchronous satellite and polar satellite

• Elasticity, Hook's law, Young's modulus, shear and bulk modulus, surface energy and surface tension, fluid pressure, atmospheric pressure, viscosity of fluids, kinetic theory of gases, gas laws, kinetic energy and temperature

• Heat, temperature, thermometers, specific heats at constant volume and constant pressure, mechanical equivalent of heat isothermal and adiabatic processes
  • Heat conduction in one dimension
  • Convection and radiation, Stefan's law and Newton's law of cooling, zeroth, first, and second law of thermodynamics
• Periodic motion, simple harmonic motion, oscillations in spring, laws of simple pendulum
• Transverse and longitudinal wave motion, speed of sound, principle of superposition, progressive and stationary waves, beats and Doppler effect

• Wave nature of light, interference, Young's double slit experiment, velocity of light and Doppler's effect in light, reflection, refraction, total internal reflection, curved mirrors, lenses, mirror and lens formulae, dispersion in prism
  • Absorption and emission spectra, optical instruments
  • The human eye, defects of vision, magnification and resolving power of telescope and microscope

• Bar magnet, lines of force, torque on a bar magnet due to magnetic field, earth's magnetic field, tangent galvanometer, vibration magnetometer, paramagnetic, diamagnetic, and ferromagnetic substances

• Coulomb's law of electrostatics, dielectric constant, electric field and potential due to a point charge, dipole, dipole field, Gauss's law in simple geometric
  • Electrostatic potential, capacitance, parallel plate and spherical capacitors, capacitors in series and parallel, energy of a capacitor

• Electric current, Ohm's law, Kirchhoff's laws, resistances in series and parallel, temperature dependence of resistance, Wheatstone bridge and potentiometer
  • Measurement of voltages and currents

• Magnetic thermal and chemical effect of current, electric power heating effects of currents, chemical effects and law of electrolysis, thermoelectricity, Biot-Savart law, magnetic fields due to a straight wire, circular loop and solenoid
  • Force on a moving charge in a magnetic field (Lorentz force), magnetic moment of a current loop, effect of a uniform magnetic field of a current loop, forces between two currents, moving galvanometer, ammeter and voltmeter

• Magnetic flux, electromagnetic induction, induced EMF, Faraday's law, Lenz's law, self and mutual inductance, alternating currents impedance and reactance growth, and decay of current in L-R circuit, elementary idea of dynamo and transformer

• e' and 'e/m' for an electron, photon, Einstein's photoelectric equation, photocells
  • Bohr model of the atom, Hydrogen spectrum, Composition of nucleus, atomic masses and isotopes, radioactivity, laws of radioactive decay, decay constant, half-life and mean life, Mass-energy relation, fission, X-Ray: properties and uses
• Elementary ideas of conductor, semiconductor and insulator, intrinsic and extrinsic semiconductors, diode, transistor, oscillator, digital circuit and logic gates
• Constitution of nucleus, Bohr's atom model, quantum numbers, Aufbau principle, electronic configuration of elements (up to-Kr), De-Broglie relation, shapes of orbital
• Electrovalent covalent and covalent bonds, hybridization (sp): Hydrogen bond, shapes of molecules (VSEPR theory), bond polarity resonance, elements of VBT
• Modes of expressing concentrations of solutions: Types of solutions, Raoult's law of colligative properties, non-ideal solution, and abnormal molecular weights
• Crystal lattices, unit cells, structure of ionic compounds close packed structure, ionic radii, imperfections (point defects): Properties of solids

• Radioactive radiations: Half-life, radioactive decay, group displacement law, structure and properties of nucleus: Nuclear reactions, disintegration series, artificial transmutation: Isotopes and their uses, radiocarbon dating
• Chemical equilibrium, law of mass action Kp and Kc: Le Chatelier's principle and its applications
• Ionic equilibria in solutions, solubility product, common ion effect, theories of acids and base hydrolysis of salts: pH, buffers

• Energy changes during a chemical reaction intrinsic energy, enthalpy, first law of thermodynamics: Hess's law, heats of reactions, second law of thermodynamics, entropy, free energy
  • Spontaneity of a chemical reaction, free energy change and chemical equilibrium, free energy as energy available for useful work
• Rate of a reaction, factors affecting the rate, rate constant, rate expression, order of reaction, first order rate constant-expression and characteristics, Arrhenius equation

• Oxidation, oxidation number and ion-electron methods, electrolytic conduction, Faraday's laws: Voltaic cell, electrode potentials, electromotive force, Gibb's energy and cell potentials, Nernst equation, commercial cells, fuel cell
  • Electrochemical theory of corrosion
• Colloids and catalysis, adsorption, colloids (types, preparation, and properties), emulsions, catalysis: Types and characteristics
• Furnaces, ore concentration, extraction, purification metallurgies of Na, Al, Fe, Cu, Ag, Zn, and Pb and their properties
• s, p, d, and f-block elements, periodic table, periodicity, atomic and ionic radii valency, ionization energy, electron affinity, electro negativity, metallic character
• Comparative study of the following families of element: (i) alkali metals (ii) alkaline earth metals (iii) nitrogen family (iv) oxygen family (v) halogens (vi) noble gases
• Electronic configuration of 3rd metal ions, oxidation states, other general characteristic properties, potassium permanganate, potassium dichromate
• Simple nomenclature, bonding and stability, classification and bonding in organometallics
• Chemistry involved is simple inorganic qualitative analysis, calculations based on acid base titrimetry

• Calculation of empirical and molecular formulae of organic compounds, nomenclature of organic compounds, common functional groups, isomerism, structure and shapes of alkanes, alkenes, and benzene
  • Preparation, properties, and uses of alkanes, alkenes, and alkynes, benzene, petroleum, cracking, octane number, gasoline additives

units.syllabus_heading: Organic compounds based on functional group containing nitrogen
units.topics_html: • Nomenclature, methods preparation, chemical properties, correlations of physical properties with structures and uses of nitro, amino, cyana, and diazo compounds
• Nomenclature, methods preparation, chemical properties, correlations of physical properties with structures and uses of ethers, aldehydes, ketones, carboxylic acids, and their derivatives

• Polymers: Classification, method of preparation, properties and uses of polymers, dyes: Classification, structure of some important dyes
  • Chemistry of drug: Introduction and classification, chemotherapy, importance of drug (antipyretic, antiseptic, antibiotic, anesthetics), chemistry in food, cosmetics, and detergent
• Classification, structures, and biological importance of carbohydrates, amino acids, peptides, proteins and enzymes, nucleic acids, and lipids

• Algebra of complex numbers, graphical representation of complex numbers, modulus and argument of complex numbers, square root of a complex number, triangular inequality
  • Cube roots of unity
  • Arithmetic, geometric, and harmonic progression, arithmetic, geometric, and harmonic means between two numbers
  • Sum of squares and cubes of first natural numbers
  • Quadratic equations, relations between roots and coefficients, permutations and combinations, binomial theorem (any index) exponential and logarithmic series
  • Determinants up to third order and their order and their elementary properties, matrices types of matrices, adjoint and inverse of matrix, elementary properties of matrices
  • Partial fraction
  • Application in solving simultaneous equations up to three variables

• Trigonometry functions and their graphs, addition and subtraction formula involving multiple and submultiples angles, general solutions of triangles equations, relations between sides and angles of a triangles, solutions of triangles, inverse
  • Trigonometrically functions, height and distance (simple problems)

• Rectangular Cartesian coordinates, straight-line pair to straight line, distance of a point from a line angle between two lines
  • Circle, tangents, and normal system of circles
  • Conic section parabola, ellipse, and hyperbola in standard forms with elementary, properties tangents and normal

• Rectangular coordinate system, direction cosine and direction ratios, equation of place in standard forms
  • Perpendicular distance from a point, equation of a line angle between two lines

• Definition of vector, addition of vectors, components in three dimensional space, scalar and vector products
  • Triple products, simple application in geometry and mechanics

• Function polynomial, rational trigonometric, logarithmic and exponential
  • Inverse function, limit, continuity, and differentiability of functions, differentiation of rational, trigonometric and exponential functions
  • Application of derivative in elementary problems in mechanics increasing and decreasing functions
  • Maxima and Minima of function of one variable
  • Roll's theorem and mean value theorem

• Integrations as the inverse process of differentiations, integration by the parts, by substitution and by partial fraction
  • Definite integral, areas under simple cures

• Formulation of differential equation, order and degree, solutions of differential equations by separation of variable method
  • Homogeneous linear differential equation of first order
• Probability addition and multiplication laws, conditional probability, binomial distribution, simple problems in correlation and regression

• Solution of equation by the methods of bisection, false-position and Newton-Raphson
  • Numerical integration by trapezoidal and Simpson's rule

• Basics of computer and its operations, functional components, main parts of computer, input devices, output devices and secondary storage devices, system software, utility software, application software

exam_name: VSAT - Vignan Scholastic Aptitude Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
VSAT 2024: Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology & Research has commenced the VSAT 2024 registration process on the official website, vignan.ac.in/v-sat. The last date to apply for the VSAT 2024 application form is April 30, 2024. Interested candidates can apply for the VSAT registration in online mode. The VSAT 2024 exam is scheduled to take place from March 1 to April 30, 2024.

The candidates are advised to go through the VSAT syllabus 2024 before starting their preparations. Before applying for VSAT 2024, candidates are required to check the eligibility criteria. The details of VSAT 2024 eligibility criteria is available on the official website. The VSAT exam 2024 is being conducted online. The total question asked in the exam will be 120. The aspirants who wish to get admission in the Vignan's University programmes have to apply for the application process of VSAT 2024 before the last date. The authorities will release the VSAT hall ticket 2024 on the official website.

Admission at Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology & Research is also through a written test (V-SAT), Eamcet, JEE Mains/Advanced, and Inter marks. Candidates have to complete the registration process to appear in the exam. 

VSAT 2024 Latest News and Notification

  • The authorities have started the VSAT 2024 application form on the official website. 

  • The authority will conduct the VAST 2024 entrance exam from March 1 to April 30, 2024.

What is VSAT 2024?

VSAT full form is Vignan's Scholastic Aptitude Test conducted by Vignan's Foundation for Science, Technology, and Research (Deemed to be University). The institute offers admission to various BTech/BPharmacy courses. The University offers many undergraduate, postgraduate, and research programs.

The authorities will release the VSAT 2024 result in online mode. After the announcement of the VSAT result, the VSAT 2024 counselling will start. Only qualified candidates will be eligible to participate in the VSAT 2024 counselling and seat allotment process.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authorities has released the VSAT 2024 eligibility criteria on the official website. Candidates are required to check the eligibility criteria of VSAT before applying for the application form of VSAT. 

VSAT eligibility criteria 2024

  • Age Limit: The candidates must be born on or after 1st July, 2003 to be eligible for VSAT 2024.

  • NRI / PIO / OCI candidates are also eligible to apply.

  • Educational Qualifications: Candidate must have passed 10+2 or its equivalent examination from a recognized board. The candidates appearing in class 12 can also apply for the application form of VSAT.

  • Candidates qualified in AP or TS EAMCET/JEE(Mains) /JEE(Advanced) with a minimum of B2 grade / CGPA of 7.0 in Andhra Pradesh or above 60% aggregate marks in Telangana State in the +2 / Intermediate examination are also eligible.

application_process.html_content:
VSAT 2024 Application form is now available on the official website. The eligible candidates can apply for the VSAT 2024 registration in both online and offline modes. The candidates have to fill out the application form at the official website before the last date. The candidates are required to fulfill the eligibility criteria before filling out the VSAT application form 2024. 

How to fill the VSAT application form?

Online Mode

  • Visit the site's official website. 

  • Register for VSAT-2024

  • Fill the application form with all the necessary details.

  • Pay the fee through online or offline mode.

  • Finally submit the application form and duly take a printout for future use.

Offline Mode

  • Candidates have to visit the University office to get the VSAT application form. 

  • Fill the application form, and attach all the necessary documents and send the application to the university along with the demand draft.

admit_card.html_content:
The admission authority will issue the admit card of VSAT 2024 in online mode only. Candidates can check their VSAT 2024 admit card by logging in to the official website. Candidates can check the details on admit card such as candidates’ names, application number, and allotted exam centre, etc.

Steps to download VSAT 2024 Admit Card 

  • Visit the official website Vignan University. 

  • Click on the VSAT 2024 admit card link.

  • Enter the login details.

  • The VSAT admit card 2024 will be displayed on the screen.

  • Download and save the Admit card and save it for further use.

counselling_process.html_content: The authorities will start the VSAT 2024 Counselling process after the declaration of result. The counselling schedule will be uploaded on the website or will be intimated to the candidates through post or SMS/Email. Qualified candidates will be able to participate in the VSAT counselling process. Candidates have to carry the original documents for the document verification process.

Understanding previous year question papers will gradeup their preparation level. exam_name: CIEAT - Crescent Institute Engineering Admission Test
conducting_body: B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CIEAT 2024 - Crescent Institute of Science and Technology has announced the CIEAT 2024 exam date online. The authority will conduct the CIEAT exam on April 27, 2024. The Creseant BTech admission test will be held in online mode and the exam duration is 3 hours. The authority issued the CIEAT 2024 admit card online. Candidates appearing for the exam must refer to the CIEAT 2024 syllabus and exam pattern for their preparations. Applicants can also go through the CIEAT sample paper and previous year question papers to check important topics asked in the exam previously.

The authority has commenced the CIEAT 2024 registration for BTech admission on January 12. The authority has updated the CIEAT BTech registration 2024 link at, crescent.education. Candidates who have passed 10+2 from a recognized board with a minimum of 50% marks can apply for CIEAT 2024. Moreover, the eligibility criteria for CIEAT BTech admission are updated online.

The application process of CIEAT 2024 comprises registration, filling application form, uploading documents, and payment of fee. To fill CIEAT application form, applicants must have passed the 10+2 or equivalent exam conducted by the State Board / CBSE / ICSE / ISC with a minimum aggregate of 50% marks in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry. Applicants appearing for their 12th class exams are also eligible to fill out the application form. 

CIEAT 2024 Latest News and Updates

Candidates can check all the latest information regarding the CIEAT exam 2024 below after the official release.

  • CIEAT BTech 2024 exam date released.
  • CIEAT BTech admission test 2024 registration started.
  • The authority will soon release the CIEAT 2024 notification.

Crescent Institute of Science and Technology will release the CIEAT 2024 admit card online at its official website. Candidates who complete the registration before the last date will be able to download the CIEAT admit card 2024. To download the CIEAT admit card candidates will have to provide the login credentials such as application number and password. 

After the conclusion of the exam, the exam authorities will release the AP CIEAT 2024 result on the official website. Following the result of CIEAT 2024, a merit list will be prepared and candidates will be invited for counselling on this basis. Seats will be allotted to candidates in offline mode based on their results and availability of seats.

highlights.value: B.S. Abdur Rahman Crescent Institute of Science and Technology

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The exam conducting authority has released the CIEAT eligibility criteria 2024 along with the official notification. The eligibility criteria of CIEAT 2024 will comprise age limit, qualifying exam, entrance exam, and other parameters. Applicants must check the CIEAT 2024 eligibility criteria before filling out the application form. For more details about CIEAT eligibility criteria, candidates can check the information below.

  • Age Limit: To be eligible for CIEAT, candidates should be born on or after July 1, 2002.

  • Regular Study: Candidates should have acquired Regular, full time and formal education to be considered eligible for CIEAT.

  • Qualifying Exam: Candidates should have passed 10+2 or equivalent exams conducted by the State Board / CBSE / ICSE with a minimum aggregate of 50% marks in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry. However, for Biotechnology and Cancer Biotechnology programmes, minimum aggregate marks in Mathematics / Biology, Physics and Chemistry are required.

  • Candidates appearing for the 10+2 exam in March /April 2024 will also be eligible to apply.

  • Entrance Exam: Candidates will have to appear in the CIEAT entrance exam or JEE Main to be eligible to apply.

application_process.html_content:
The authority has released the CIEAT 2024 application form online at the official website, crescent.education.
The application form of CIEAT 2024 will be released in both online and offline mode. The CIEAT application process comprises of registration, form filling, and payment of the CIEAT registration fee. Cadidates must check the CIEAT eligibility criteria 2024 before applying. Below are the steps to fill out the CIEAT application form.

Steps to fill CIEAT 2024 Application Form

CIEAT application form 2024 includes the following steps:

Step 1- Filling of Personal Details: Candidates have to fill in their full name, gender, date of birth, address, mobile number, email Id, etc with three preferences of B.Tech programmes.

Step 2 – Providing Qualification Details & Uploading Photograph: Candidates had to provide their qualification exam details like year and month of passing, registration number, marks obtained etc. They also had to upload their recent passport-size color photograph in the dimensions specified officially.

            

 Dimensions        

            

Format                        

        		            

Size

        
30 mm x 45 mm        .jp or .jpeg        Maximum             80 KB        

Step 3 – Payment of Fees: After uploading the photograph, candidates have to pay the application fee of Rs 1000. The fees could be paid in either mode – online or offline. 

For online mode - Candidates can pay the fees in online mode.

For offline mode – To pay the fees in offline mode, candidates have to pay through DD. Candidates can also choose to pay through cash at the fee counter of the university. Candidates paying through DD had to send the DD to the University to avoid rejection of the application form.

Step 4 – Preview and Submission: Candidates have to agree to the declaration given and check the preview of the form filled. Once satisfied, candidates had to submit it.

admit_card.html_content:
Applicants will be able to download the CIEAT 2024 admit card in online mode. The authority will release the admit card of CIEAT 2024 online at the official website. Candidates will have to provide the application number and password to download the CIEAT admit card. The admit card will comprise candidate details, exam centre address, and exam name. Carry the CIEAT admit card 2024  along with one valid ID proof at the examination centre.

In case of any discrepancy in the admit card of CIEAT, candidates must contact the exam authority for corrections before the exam. No candidates will be allowed to appear for the CIEAT exam without an admit card. The steps to download the CIEAT admit card are given below. 

How to download the CIEAT admit card 2024?

  • Visit the CIEAT 2024 official website.

  • Click on the direct link to download the admit card.

  • Enter the login credentials in the required fields.

  • Check all the details mentioned in the CIEAT admit card.

  • Download the admit card for future reference.

counselling_process.html_content: CIEAT counselling 2024 will be conducted by the institute on the basis of entrance exam result and merit list. The qualified candidates will be invited for CIEAT counselling as per their ranks in the merit list. Candidates will have to be present physically at the time of CIEAT 2024 counselling along with their original documents and fees to be paid in case of seat allotment.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The authority will release the CIEAT 2024 exam pattern online with official notification. Candidates will be able to check the exam pattern of CIEAT 2024 to know the structure of the paper. CIEAT exam pattern 2024 will comprise of marking scheme, duration of questions, types of questions, and sections. The authority will conduct the CIEAT exam in online mode for 2 hours. There will be a total of 100 questions. No negative marking will be done for wrong attempts. Along with the exam pattern, candidates can also refer to the CIEAT syllabus for their preparations.

units.topics_html:
• Inverse of a non-singular square matrix, adjoint of a square matrix, definition of inverse matrix of a square matrix, properties of inverses of matrices, application of matrices to geometry, elementary transformations of a matrix
  • Elementary row and column operations, row-echelon form, rank of a matrix, applications of matrices: Solving system of linear equations, formation of a system of linear equations, System of linear equations in matrix form
  • Solution to a system of linear equations

• Powers of imaginary unit, complex numbers, rectangular form, Argand plane, algebraic operations on complex number, basic algebraic properties of complex numbers, properties of complex numbers
  • Conjugate of a complex number geometrical representation of conjugate of a complex number, properties of complex conjugates, modulus of a complex number, properties of modulus of a complex number, square roots of a complex number
  • Geometry and locus of complex numbers

• Basics of polynomial equations, different types of polynomial equations, quadratic equations, Vieta's formulae and formation of polynomial equations, Vieta's formula for quadratic equations, Vieta's formula for polynomial equations
  • Nature of roots and nature of coefficients of polynomial equations, imaginary roots, irrational roots, rational roots, roots of higher degree polynomial equations, polynomials with additional information, imaginary or surds roots
  • Polynomial equations with even powers only, zero sum of all coefficients, equal sums of coefficients of odd and even powers, polynomial equations with no additional information, reciprocal equations, descartes rule, statement of descartes rule
  • Attainment of bounds

• Domain and range of trigonometric functions, graphs of functions, amplitude and period of a graph, inverse functions, graphs of inverse functions, sine function and inverse sine function, properties of the sine function
  • The inverse sine function and its properties, the cosine function and inverse cosine function, properties of the cosine function, the inverse cosine function and its properties, the tangent function and the inverse tangent function
  • Properties of the tangent function, the inverse tangent function and its properties, the cosecant function and the inverse cosecant function, the inverse cosecant function, the secant function and inverse secant function, inverse secant function
  • The cotangent function and the inverse cotangent function, inverse cotangent function, principal value of inverse trigonometric functions

• Circle, equation of a circle in standard form, equations of tangent and normal at a point P on a given circle, conics-the general equation of a conic, parabola, ellipse, hyperbola, conic sections, geometric description of conic section, degenerate forms
  • Degenerate forms, parametric form of conics, parametric equations, tangents and normals to conics, real-life applications of conic, parabola, ellipse, hyperbola, reflective property of parabola, reflective property of ellipse

• Scalar product and vector product, geometrical interpretation, scalar triple product, properties of the scalar triple product, vector triple product, Jacobi's identity and Lagrange's identity, application of vectors to 3D geometry
  • Different forms of equation of a plane

• Derivative, indeterminate forms applications of first derivative, monotonicity of functions, absolute maxima and minima, relative extrema on an interval, extrema using first derivative test, concavity, convexity, and points of inflection
  • Extrema using second derivative test

• Improper integrals, reduction formulae, gamma integral, evaluation of bounded plane area by integration, area of the region bounded by a curve, x-axis and the lines x = a and x = b
  • Area of the region bounded by a curve, y-axis and the lines y = c and y = d
  • Area of the region bounded between two curves

• Differential equation, order, and degree, formation of differential equations, formation of differential equations from physical situations, solution of ordinary differential equations, solution of first order and first-degree differential equations
  • Variables separable method, homogeneous form or homogeneous differential equation, first order linear differential equations, applications of first order ordinary differential equations

• Random variable, types of random variable, discrete random variables, probability mass function, cumulative distribution function or distribution function, cumulative distribution function from probability mass function,
  • Probability mass function from cumulative distribution function, continuous distributions, the definition of continuous random variable, probability density function, distribution function, distribution function from probability density function
  • Probability density function from probability distribution function

• Binary operations, definitions, some more properties of a binary operation, some binary operations on boolean matrices, modular arithmetic, mathematical logic, statement and its truth value, compound statements, logical connectives and truth tables
  • Tautology, contradiction, and contingency, duality, logical equivalence

• Coulomb's law, electric field, electric dipole, electric field due to a dipole, electrostatic potential and potential energy, electrostatic potential energy & electrostatic potential, electric flux, gauss law, capacitors
  • Distribution of charges in a conductor

• Electric current, Ohm's law, resistivity, energy and power in electrical circuits, Kirchhoff's first rule, Kirchhoff's second rule, Wheatstone’s bridge, metre bridge, thermoelectric current, seebeck effect, Peltier effect, Thomson effect

units.syllabus_heading: Magnetism and magnetic effects of electric current
units.topics_html: • Coulomb's inverse square law of magnetism, Biot-Savart law, ampere circuital law, Lorentz force, force on a moving charge in a magnetic, moving coil galvanometer

• Electromagnetic induction, magnetic fLux, Fleming's right-hand rule, self-induction, methods of producing induced EMF, transformer, construction and working of transformer, energy losses in transformer, alternating current-Q-factor, power in AC circuits
• Displacement current and MaxweLL's correction to ampere’s circuital law, electromagnetic waves, electromagnetic spectrum, types of spectrum emission and absorption spectrum

• Rate of chemical reaction, rate law and rate constant, molecularity, integrated rate equation, half-life period of a reaction, Arrhenius equation
• Acids and bases, strength of acids and bases, ionisation of water, the pH scale, common ion effect, buffer solution, solubility product

• Conductivity of electrolytic solution, variation of molar conductivity with concentration, thermodynamics of cell reactions
  • Nernst equation, electrolytic cell and electrolysis, Faraday's law of electrolysis first law, second law, electrochemical series

• Adsorption and absorption characteristics of adsorption, physical and chemical adsorption, catalysis positive and negative catalysis, colloid, dispersion phase and dispersion medium, preparation of colloids

  • Preparation of ethers, physical properties, chemical properties

• Nomenclature of aldehyde and ketones, structure of carbonyl group, general methods of preparation of aldehydes and ketones-physical properties, chemical properties,
  • Carboxylic acids-nomenclature, structure of carboxyl group, methods of preparation, physical properties, chemical properties

• Classification of nitro compounds-nomenclature, isomerism, preparation of nitroaLkanes, physical and chemical properties of nitro alkanes, amines, classification nomenclature IUPAC system of amines, structure
  • General methods of preparation of amines physical and chemical properties
• Carbohydrate, classification, glucose, fructose, disaccharides, proteins amino acids, nucleic acids

units.syllabus_heading: Asexual and sexual reproduction in plants
units.topics_html: • Asexual reproduction, pre-fertilization structure and events, androecium, gynoecium, pollination, apomixis, polyembryony, parthenocarpy
• Heredity and variation, monohybrid cross, intragenic interactions, intergenic interactions
• Comparison between gene and chromosome behaviour, linkage, crossing over, multiple allele, types of mutation, chromosomal mutations

• Fermentation, advancements in modern biotechnology, tools for genetic engineering, methods of gene transfer, screening for recombinants, herbicide tolerant, insect resistance, Bt crops, polyhydroxybutyrate (PHB), bioremediation, bioprospecting
• Introduction, techniques involved in PTC, types of plant tissue culture, meristem culture applications of plant tissue culture, cryopreservation

• Photosynthetically active radiation, energy flow, food chain, food web, ecological pyramids, biogeochemical cycle, carbon cycle and phosphate cycle, types of ecosystems, plant succession, ecological succession

• Greenhouse effect and global warming and ozone depletion, forestry, deforestation, afforestation, alien species, carbon capture and storage, environmental impact assessment
  • Pollution, biomagnification, eutrophication, organic farming and its implementation, solid waste management

• Mode of reproduction, sexual reproduction, human reproductive system, gametogenesis, fertilization and implantation, maintenance of pregnancy and embryonic development, need for reproductive health problems and strategies
  • Amniocentesis and its statutory ban, population explosion and birth control
• Multiple alleles, human blood groups, genetic control of Rh factor, sex determination, sex-linked inheritance, karyotyping, pedigree analysis

• Gene as the functional unit of inheritance, DNA is the genetic material, RNA-world, properties of genetic material, packaging of DNA helix, transcription, genetic code, translation regulation of gene expression
• Origin of life, geological time scale, biological evolution, theories of biological evolution, Hardy-Weinberg principle
• Common diseases in human beings, maintenance of personal and public hygiene, basic concepts of immunology, adolescence-drug and alcohol abuse, mental health and depression
• Microbes in industrial products, microbes in sewage treatment, bioremediation
• Applications in medicine, gene therapy, stem cell therapy, molecular diagnostics
• Organisms and its environment, major abiotic components or factors, populations, population attributes, population interaction
• Biodiversity, importance of biodiversity, global and india, causes of biodiversity loss

exam_name: MUZEEE - Mizoram University Engineering Entrance Exam

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
MZUEEE 2024: Mizoram University commenced the MZUEEE 2024 registration process for phase 2 on June 3, 2024. Interested candidates have to check the MZUEEE 2024 exam syllabus and exam pattern before applying. The last date for submitting the MZUEEE 2024 application form is June 9, 2024. Registration candidates can download the MZUEEE 2024 admit card for phase 2 from June 10 to 12, 2024. The authority will conduct the MZUEEE 2024 exam for phase 2 on June 12, 2024. The MZUEEE 2024 result for phase 2 on June 13, 2024.

The question paper of MZUEEE 2024 will contain Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) from class 11 and 12 topics of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics. The MZUEEE 2024 paper will consist of 200 questions from Physics, chemistry and Maths. The duration of the exam will be 3 hours. 

The authority concluded the MZUEEE 2024 registration process for phase 1 on May 15, 2024. The authority conducted the MZUEEE 2024 for phase 1 on May 28, 2024. The MUZEEE exam will be conducted in physical mode as offline exam. The authority has announced the MZUEEE 2024 for phase 1 on May 29, 2024.

MZUEEE Latest News and notification

The authority has commenced the MZUEEE 2024 registration process for phase 2.

The authority has announced the MZUEEE 2024 dates for phase 2.

The authority conducted the MZUEEE 2024 exam for phase 1.

The authority concluded the MZUEEE 2024 registration for phase 1.

The authority has extended the MZUEEE 2024 registration date for phase 1.

The authorities has released the MZUEEE 2024 official notification and application form at mzu.edu.in. 

What is MZUEEE? 

Mizoram University Engineering Entrance Exam (MZUEEE) is conducted by Mizoram university. The University offers admission to various BTech, B.Tech LE degree courses. The MZUEEE is conducted as an offline/ pen paper based entrance exam. 

The qualified candidates will be invited for the counselling process, to be held on June 13, 2024. At the time of counselling, candidates will have to carry all the original documents and report to the allotted centre. Candidates must note that 50% of seats are filled through MZUEEE and the rest 50% will be filled by CSAB through JEE Main score.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authorities has release the MZUEEE 2024 eligibility criteria before filling the application form. Candidates who do not qualify the MZUEEE eligibility criteria will not be eligible to fill the MZUEEE 2024 application form. Therefore, it is mandatory to fulfil all the conditions of eligibility. Candidates can check the MZUEEE eligibility criteria below:

MZUEEE 2024 Eligibility Criteria for BTech

  • The candidate must have passed Class 12 from a recognized board or university, with Science subjects (Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics) having a score of at least 50% aggregate. The SC and ST candidates will be eligible for 5% relaxation.

  • The candidates appearing in the Class XII exam are also eligible to apply for MZUEEE.

  • The candidates must be born on or after October 1, 1997 and SC/ST and PWD candidates born on or after October 1, 1990, will be eligible to apply. The SC, ST and PWD candidates, upper age limit is relaxed by 5 years, i.e. candidates who were born on or after October 01, 1992 are eligible. For Date of birth Secondary Education Board/University certificate only will be taken as authentic.

MZUEEE 2024 Eligibility Criteria for B Tech Lateral Entry

  • The candidate must have a three-year diploma in engineering in a relevant branch with a minimum of 60% aggregate from a recognized university. For SC/ST candidates relaxation by 5% for lateral entry will be provided.

  • For SC/ST candidates the minimum aggregate percentage is 50%

  • The candidates appearing in the final examination can also apply. 

  • 3 year diploma holder in engineering in relevant branch with a minimum of 60%. Those appearing in the final semester examination in 2024 may also appear in MZUEEE 2024 provisionally.

application_process.html_content:
Mizoram University has commenced the MZUEEE 2024 registration process for phase 2 on June 3, 2024. Candidates have to fill the application before the last date is June 9, 2024. The application process of MZUEEE included the online registration, uploading the scanned image of photo, signature and payment of application fee. 

How to apply for MZUEEE Application Form 2024?

  • Visit the official website of MZUEEE.

  • Click on link MZUEE 2024 Application form

  • Enter all the basic required details

  • Upload scanned documents of photo and signature.

  • Pay the application fee and submit it.

  • Download the application form printout for further use.

admit_card.html_content:
The exam authority will release the MZUEEE admit card for phase 2 on June 10, 2024. The MZUEEE admit cards will be available on the official website. Candidates will have to login to the website through the login credentials. On the MZUEE admit card the details like exam date and time, address of the exam centre, candidates basic details like name, photo, signature and exam day guidelines will be mentioned. Candidates must note that no candidates will be allowed to enter the examination centre without an admit card. Candidates have to carry one photo ID proof alongwith the admit card. Candidates can check steps to download the MZUEEE 2024 admit card below.

How to Download MZUEEE Admit Card? 

  • Open the official website of Mizoram University.

  • Click on MZUEEE 2024 admit card download link.

  • Login using application form number and password.

  • Download the admit card and take its printout.

counselling_process.html_content: The exam authority will conduct the MZUEEE counselling 2024 process in online mode. The candidates who will qualify the MZUEEE result 2024 will be able to participate in MZUEEE counselling. The candidates have to apply for the counselling registration and have to report to the allotted centre for document verification process. Candidates have to carry all the original documents and their xerox copies for the counselling process. The MZUEEE seat allotment process will be done on the basis of marks secured in the MZUEEE 2024 test. As per the official notification 50% of seats will be filled through MZUEEE and the rest 50% will be filled by CSAB through JEE Main score.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Mizoram University has released the MZUEEE exam pattern 2024 online mode. The candidates must check the exam pattern of MZUEEE 2024 to prepare for the exam. The MZUEEE exam pattern will consist of type of questions, marking scheme, exam duration, subjects, number of questions and more. Check the detailed information on MZUEEE 2024 exam pattern below:

Identity Proof (Aadhar Card, Voter ID, Driving License, Passport, etc.)
JEE Main 2023 Score Card or MZUEEE 2023 Result

exam_name: VEE - VELS Entrance Exam

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
VEE UG 2024 - VELS Institute of Science, Technology and Advanced Studies (VISTAS) will release the VEE UG application form 2024 on the website velsuniv.ac.in. Candidates willing to get admission through the VEE UG exam 2024 are required to fill the application form. Candidates are advised to check the eligibility criteria before applying for the exam, as failure to fulfil the eligibility criteria will lead to disqualification.

VEE UG 2024 exam will be conducted in online mode. Candidates willing to take admission into B.Tech/B.E. courses at VELS Institute of Science, Technology and Advanced Studies through the entrance exam can check all the details regarding, the admission process, admit card, answer key, result, and counselling procedure here.

VEE UG 2024:

VELS Entrance Exam (VEE UG 2024) is conducted every year for admission to B.Tech/B.E. courses at the university. The university offers admission to candidates based on their VEE UG rank 2024.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
VELS Institute of Science, Technology and Advanced Studies will release the VEE UG 2024 eligibility criteria on the official website velsuniv.ac.in. The eligibility criteria of VEE 2024 includes the requirements that candidates have to meet to be eligible to appear for the entrance exam. Here we have mentioned the eligibility criteria for your reference. 

Eligibility criteria for B.Tech/BE:

Candidates must have passed a minimum 3 years Diploma or (10+2) examination with physics/ mathematics/ chemistry/ computer science/ Electronics/ Information Technology/ Biology/ Informatics Practices/ Biotechnology / Technical Vocational Subject/ Agriculture / Engineering Graphics / Business studies/ Entrepreneurship. (Any of three) or B.Sc. Degree from a recognized University as defined by UGC or D.Voc. Stream in the same or allied sector.

Marks required: Candidates must have obtained at least 45% Marks (40% marks in the candidates belonging to reserved category) in the above subject taken together.

application_process.html_content:
The application form of VEE UG 2024 will be available online on the official website as well as in offline mode. Candidates are advised to fill the application form before the last date of submission to avoid any rush in the registration process.

The registration form filling includes steps like filling the application form, uploading the scanned images of your photo and signature; and payment of the application fee through credit/debit card/internet banking. But before applying for the exam candidates must check the eligibility criteria of VEE UG 2024.

How To Fill Online VEE UG 2024 Application Form:

  • Open the official website

  • Click on “Apply Now” button

  • Fill in your name, phone number, email id and course you are applying for.

  • Verify your email id and phone number and create password

  • Now, fill your personal details, parent’s details, address, and academic details

  • Upload the required documents.

  • Now pay the fees.

  • Take a printout for your reference. 

Documents Required for VEE UG 2024 application form:

1. Qualifying examination mark statements of all attempts 

2. Transfer Certificate/School Leaving Certificate 

3. Migration Certificate(if issued by the board) 

4. Conduct Certificate 

5. Community Certificate 

6. Provisional Admission Letter. (photocopy) 

7. Recent Pass port size colour photos 4 nos. 

8. Physical Fitness Certificate for Maritime Courses. 

9. 2 sets of photo copies of all original documents

preparation_tips.html_content:
Students who are preparing for VEE entrance exam 2024 must go through the preparation tips of the exam so as to perform well and get good marks in the exam. Here are a few tips from that candidates need to follow to prepare for the exam:

  • Firstly, go through the official syllabus of VEE UG 2024

  • Understand the VEE 2024 exam pattern

  • Get best preparation books for VEE 2024

  • Plan a proper study timetable 

  • Solve the previous year’s papers

admit_card.html_content:
VEE UG admit card 2024 will be released by the institute on their official website. Only those students who will register successfully for the entrance examination will be able to download admit card of VEE UG 2024 in online mode within the given timelines. To download the VEE 2024, candidates need to enter their login details. The admit card will include details like the candidate's name, exam date, exam time, and test centre address. 

How To Download VEE Admit Card:

  • Open the official website 

  • Click on “Admit Card of VEE” link.

  • Enter your Email ID and password.

  • Enter the captcha code.

  • Click on “Download Admit Card” button.

  • Take the printout of the VEE UG 2024 admit card.

Note: Take 2 printouts of the admit card and save it for future reference.

VEE 2024 Exam Day Guidelines:

VEE UG 2024 exam day guidelines will be available on the admit cards of VEE 2024. The detailed exam guidelines will be issued on the official website of institute along with the admit card. 

Exam Day Guidelines:

  • Candidates do not forget to bring their VEE UG 2024 admit card along with a valid government authorised ID proof as per the guidelines for exam day.

  • Candidates must reach their centres at least 60 minutes prior to reporting time to avoid rush.

  • Candidates are advised to carry two passport-sized photos(same as uploaded in VEE application form) if the photo on their admit card is not clear. 

  • No candidates will not be allowed to carry any electronic devices like Bluetooth, calculators, smartwatches, cellphones in the VEE 2024 exam hall.

counselling_process.html_content:
Once the result of VEE UG 2024 will be released, the counselling will be conducted for admission in undergraduate courses in offline mode. To appear in the offline counselling candidates need to fill their choices and pay the processing fee and visit the institute physically.

Documents Required For Counselling:

  1. VEE UG scorecard 2024

  2. VEE Counselling call letter 2024

  3. Past academic documents

  4. VEE UG 2024 admit card

  5. Other important certificates.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Candidates must prepare for the exam according to the official VEE 2024 exam pattern to get an idea of the actual exam paper. VEE UG 2024 will have 3 sections namely: Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. The official exam pattern of VEE 2024 is as follows:

Particulars

Details

Examination Mode

Offline

Duration of Exam

1.5 Hours

Medium of Exam

English

Question Type

MCQs

Marking Scheme

1 mark will be given for each correct answer and no marks will be deducted for incorrect answer

faqs.question: Can I join Vels University without an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Vels University admission is based on merit and entrance exam. Moreover, candidates must fulfil the eligibility conditions.

faqs.question: What is Vels entrance exam syllabus?
faqs.answer: The authority will release the Vels entrance exam syllabus online. The syllabus will be based on Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.

faqs.question: Does Vels University have an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Yes, Vels University conducts the Vels Entrance Exam (VEE) for admission to the  B.Tech courses.

faqs.question: What is the fee for Vels University entrance exam 2024?
faqs.answer: The application fee for Vels University entrance exam is Rs. 1000.

exam_name: AAEEE - Avinashilingam Engineering Entrance Examination
conducting_body: Avinashilingam Institute for Home Science and Higher Education for Women

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
AAEEE 2025- Avinashilingam University will release the detailed AAEEE 2025 exam schedule on the official website at avinuty.ac.in. The authority will conduct the AAEEE exam 2025 in online mode. The link to register for the Avinashilingam University entrance exam 2025 will be made available on the official website. Candidates must check their eligibility criteria for the AAEEE exam before registration. 

The AAEEE information brochure will contain detailed information about the exam pattern, syllabus, eligibility & how to apply for the AAEEE 2025 exam. Interested & eligible candidates must apply before the last date. The AAEEE 2025 exam dates will be announced on the official website. Avinashilingam University also accepts applications from CUET exam-qualified candidates. The authority will conduct CUET 2025 in online mode.

Avinashilingam Engineering Entrance Examination (AEEE) is conducted for admission to the B.E & B.E( lateral entry) courses offered by Avinashilingam institute. The institute is an all-female college that strives to produce industry-ready women well-equipped with the technical knowledge required to compete in today’s world. The institute was established in 1996 according to the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi norms. 

The engineering curriculum of the Avinashilingam Institute is based on the Outcome Based Education (OBE) syllabus, which is updated annually. The admission process for Avinashilingam  Engineering Institute is conducted through its exam called the Avinashilingam Engineering Entrance Examination (AEEE). Apart from AAEEE, CUET-qualified candidates are also eligible to apply for admission.

application_process.html_content:
The authority will release the AAEEE registration dates on the official website. The application form process will consist of filling out the form, document upload & fee payment. Candidates should keep checking the official website for more information.

Step 1: Filling up the application form:

The candidates must enter the following details before applying for AAEEE 2025 exam.

  • Name, date of birth & guardians name

  • Marks list of 10+2 exam

Complete details about the required documents to be submitted will be released with AAEEE registration form online. The dates for the AAEEE 2025 exam will be announced on the official website.

Step 2: AAEEE 2025 application fee payment

The authority will pay an application fee while registering for the AAEEE 2025 exam. The AEAEE 2025 registration fee is different for general & reservation category candidates.

AAEEE Application Fee 2025

Category

Fees

General

Rs 200

Reserved

Rs 100

Once the candidate has filled in the application form & paid the registration fees, they should make sure to submit the AAEEE 2025 application form. Failure to do so will cause the candidate's application to not be registered online.

preparation_tips.html_content:
Aspirants of the AEEE 2025 exam should prepare for the exam thoroughly to qualify. The following preparation tips can be helpful while studying for the AEEE 2025 exam.

  • Remember important dates: Candidates should always remember the important dates of the Avinashilingam Engineering Entrance Examination 2025. This will help the candidates avoid missing the dates & have a timeline for the exam. 

  • AAEEE exam pattern & syllabus: Candidates should familiarise themselves with the AAEEE 2025 exam pattern & syllabus. Knowing the syllabus will help candidates analyse their strong & weak points and curate a good preparation time table.

  • Solving AAEEE 2025 question & sample papers: Aspirants should thoroughly practise the Avinashilingam Engineering Entrance Examination 2025 sample papers before attempting the AAEEE exam. This will help the candidates learn about how to attempt the AAEEE 2025 exam.

admit_card.html_content:
The admit card for AEEE 2025 will be made available on the official website. Candidates require their login credentials to login & download their admit card. Registered candidates will be able to download their AEEE 2025 admit card once it is released. Candidates need to verify all the details on the AEEE 2025 admit card as soon as they download it. 

Steps to download the AAEEE 2025 admit card:

Candidates can follow the below steps to download the admit card for AAEEE 2025 exam

  • Visit official website at avinuty.ac.in 

  • Click on the AAEEE 2025 admit card link

  • Enter the AAEE 2025 login credentials & click on submit

  • The AAEEE 2025 admit card will be displayed on screen.

  • Download & save as pdf

counselling_process.html_content:
The authority will release the AAEEE 2025 counselling schedule online. The authority will commence the AAEEE counselling on the official website. The link to register for the Avinashilingam Institute counselling will be updated on the website once the counselling process commences. 

The general procedure to apply for AAEEE 2025 counselling is given below

Step 1- Registration- Candidates have to register for the Avinashilingam Institute counselling process on the official website. The registration process will include entry of details such as name, score in the AAEEE exam & qualifying exam

Step 2- Choice filling- once the candidates have registered for the AAEEE counselling, They will then have to fill in the preferences of course into which they want to gain admission.

Step 3- seat allotment- Based on the choices filled in by the candidates, the authority will announce the AAEEE 2025 seat allotment result online. The seat allotment of AAEEE 2025 will inform the candidates about the course into which they have gained admission.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
AAEEE 2025 exam pattern will be released by the authority on the official website. The exam pattern of AAEEE 2025 exam is the model in which the exam will be conducted. Candidates who want to attempt the AAEEE 2025 exam should be well aware of the AAEEE paper pattern.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for AAEEE 2025 admission into B.E lateral entry?
faqs.answer: Candidates who have passed a diploma from an AICTE approved Institution, with a minimum of 45% for general category & 40% for reserved category candidates.

faqs.question: When will the AAEEE 2025 registration start?
faqs.answer: The authority is yet to announce the schedule for the AAEEE 2025 exam online in March tentatively.

faqs.question: Is Avinashilingam Engineering institute co-ed?
faqs.answer: No, Avinashilingam Institute offers UG & PG Courses only for female candidates

faqs.question: Is there any other way to get admission to Avinashilingam Engineering college?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates who have qualified in the CUET 2025 exam are also eligible to apply for admission into Avinashilingam Institute for Home Science and Higher Education for Women.
